card.name: Ariel - On Human Legs
card.text: VOICELESS: This character can't ↷ to sing songs.

card.name: Ariel - Spectacular Singer
card.text: Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.) MUSICAL DEBUT: When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a song card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Cinderella - Gentle and Kind
card.text: Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.) A WONDERFUL DREAM: ↷ - Remove up to 3 damage from chosen Princess character.

card.name: Goofy - Musketeer
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) AND TWO FOR TEA!: When you play this character, you may remove up to 2 damage from each of your Musketeer characters.

prop.Franchise: Mickey, Donald, Goofy: The Three Musketeers
prop.Flavor: "En Gawrsh!"

card.name: Hades - King of Olympus
card.text: Shift 6 (You may pay 6⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Hades.) SINISTER PLOT: This character gets +1◆ for each other Villain character you have in play.

prop.Flavor: "Oh hey, I'm gonna need new business cards."

card.name: Hades - Lord of the Underworld
card.text: WELL OF SOULS: When you play this character, return a character card from your discard to your hand.

prop.Flavor: "Production is up, costs are down, the rivers are full. Time to talk expansion."

card.name: HeiHei - Boat Snack
card.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)

prop.Flavor: "Sometimes, our strengths lie beneath the surface. Far beneath, in some cases. . . ." - Moana

card.name: LeFou - Bumbler
card.text: LOYAL: If you have a character named Gaston in play, you pay 1⬡ less to play this character.

prop.Flavor: You need a good toady to be a proper bad guy.
"A falling star . . . I have to make a wish!"

card.name: Maximus - Palace Horse
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)

card.name: Maximus - Relentless Pursuer
card.text: HORSE KICK: When you play this character, chosen character gets -2※ this turn.

prop.Flavor: He pursues his quarry with courage, discipline, and a touch of class.
As long as he's around, newcomers to the Great Illuminary will always get a warm welcome.
Wherever the princess goes, her musketeers are . . . well, they're around somewhere, probably.

card.name: Moana - Of Motunui
card.text: WE CAN FIX IT: Whenever this character quests, you may ready your other Princess Characters. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

prop.Flavor: "I am Moana of Motunui. You will board my boar, sail across the sea, and restore the heart of Te Fiti."
"Mr. Smee is a kind, gentle soul who lives to bring comfort and aid to a twisted old villain. Now, what good is kindness like that?" - Peter Pan

card.name: Prince Phillip - Dragonslayer
card.text: HEROISM: When this character challenges and is banished, you may banish the challenged character.

prop.Flavor: "The road to true love may be barred by still many more dangers, which you alone will have to face." - Flora
"You gotta put your behind in your past."

card.name: Rapunzel - Gifted with Healing
card.text: GLEAM AND GLOW: When you play this character, remove up to 3 damage from one of your characters. Draw a card for each 1 damage removed this way.

card.name: Sebastian - Court Composer
card.text: Singer 4 (This character counts as cost 4 to sing songs.)

prop.Flavor: "I should be writing symphonies, not tagging along after some headstrong teenager."

card.name: Simba - Protective Cub
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

prop.Flavor: Courage comes in all sizes.

card.name: Stitch - Carefree Surfer
card.text: OHANA: When you play this character, if you have 2 or more other characters in play, you may draw 2 cards.

prop.Flavor: "So you're from outer space, huh? I hear the surfing's choice." - David
Lilo: "David! I got a new dog!" David: "Auwe! . . . You sure it's a dog?" Lilo: "Uh-huh. He used to be a collie before he got ran over."

card.name: Stitch - Rock Star
card.text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Stitch.) ADORING FANS: Whenever you play a character with cost 2 or less, you may exert them to draw a card.

prop.Flavor: The best part about a beachside concert is that there's always room for one more.

card.name: Timon - Grub Rustler
card.text: TASTES LIKE CHICKEN: When you play this character, you may remove up to 1 damage from chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "There's all manner of tasty treats in the world - ya just gotta know where to look."

card.name: Be Our Guest
card.text: (A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Control Your Temper!
card.text: Chosen character gets -2※ this turn.

card.name: Hakuna Matata
card.text: (A character with cost 4 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Remove up to 3 damage from each of your characters.

prop.Flavor: What a wonderful phrase!

card.name: Healing Glow
card.text: Remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "Don't freak out!" - Rapunzel

card.name: Just in Time
card.text: You may play a character with cost 5 or less for free.

prop.Flavor: The best heroes always arrive at the perfect moment - whether they know it or not.

card.name: Part of Your World
card.text: (A character with cost 3 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Return a character card from your discard to your hand.

prop.Flavor: What would I give If I could live out of these waters?

card.name: You Have Forgotten Me
card.text: Each opponent chooses and discards 2 cards.

prop.Flavor: "You are more than what you have become." - Mufasa

card.name: Dinglehopper
card.text: STRAIGHTEN HAIR: ↷ - Remove up to 1 damage from chosen character.

prop.Flavor: Enjoy the finest of human hairstyles!

card.name: Lantern
card.text: BIRTHDAY LIGHTS: ↷ - You play 1⬡ less for the next character you play this turn.

prop.Flavor: Lanterns fill the sky on one special night, beacons of hope and love.

card.name: Ursula's Shell Necklace
card.text: NOW, SING!: Whenever you play a song, you may pay 1⬡ to draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Singing is a lovely pastime . . . if you've got the voice for it." - Ursula

card.name: Anna - Heir to Arendelle
card.text: LOVING HEART: When you play this character, if you have a character named Elsa in play, choose an opposing character. The chosen character doesn't ready at the start of their next turn.

prop.Flavor: "Two sisters, one mind."
"Flying is not merely some crude, mechanical process. It is a delicate art. Purely aesthetic. Poetry of motion. And the best way to learn it is to do it!"

card.name: Dr. Facilier - Agent Provocateur
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Dr. Facilier.) INTO THE SHADOWS: Whenever one of your other characters is banished in a challenge, you may return that card to your hand.

card.name: Dr. Facilier - Charlatan
card.text: Challenger +2 (When challenging, this character get +2※.)

prop.Flavor: "Enchantée. A tip of the hat from Dr. Facilier."

card.name: Dr. Facilier - Remarkable Gentleman
card.text: DREAMS MADE REAL: Whenever you play a song, you may look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one on the top of your deck and the other on the bottom.

prop.Flavor: "I never knew what I was capable of."

card.name: Elsa - Snow Queen
card.text: FREEZE: ↷ - Exert chosen opposing character.

prop.Flavor: Recreated by magical ink, Elsa found herself in an entirely new world. Fortunately, ice works the same way everywhere.

card.name: Elsa - Spirit of Winter
card.text: Shift 6 (You may pay 6⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Elsa.) DEEP FREEZE: When you play this character, exert up to 2 chosen characters. They can't ready at the start of their next turn.

prop.Flavor: "Ice is stronger than you may think."

card.name: Flotsam - Ursula's Spy
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) DEXTEROUS LUNGE: Your characters named Jetsam gain Rush.

prop.Flavor: "We know someone who can help you . . . for a price."

card.name: Jafar - Keeper of Secrets
card.text: HIDDEN WONDERS: This character gets +1※ for each card in your hand.

prop.Flavor: "There's more than one way to bury secrets."

card.name: Jafar - Wicked Sorcerer
card.text: Challenger +3 (When challenging, this character gets +3※.)

prop.Flavor: "Enough skulking about. It's time to show that sniveling sultan what a sorcerer can do."

card.name: Jetsam - Ursula's Spy
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Sinister Slither - Your characters named Flotsam gain Evasive.

prop.Flavor: "We can help you get anything you want. . . ."

card.name: Magic Broom - Bucket Brigade
card.text: SWEEP: When you play this character, you may shuffle a card from any discard into its player's deck.

prop.Flavor: "In the immense story-forge known as the Great Illuminary, there is always work to be done."
"One mustn't rush these things, or the greatest plan might come to nothing."

card.name: Maleficent - Sorceress
card.text: Cast My Spell! - When you play this character, you may draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "You dare challenge me? Fool, my magic is more powerful than you could possibly imagine!"

card.name: Marshmallow - Persistent Guardian
card.text: DURABLE: When this character is banished in a challenge, you may return this card to your hand.

prop.Flavor: "Hey! We were just talking about you! All good things, all good things." - Olaf

card.name: Mickey Mouse - Wayward Sorcerer
card.text: Animate Broom - You pay 1⬡ less to play Broom characters. CEASELESS WORKER: Whenever one of your Broom characters is banished in a challenge, you may return that card to your hand.

prop.Flavor: "He always goes for the clean sweep."
"I'm Olaf and I like warm hugs!"

card.name: Pascal - Rapunzel's Companion
card.text: CAMOUFLAGE: While you have another character in play, this character gains Evasive. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

prop.Flavor: "A true friend is always there for you, whether you can see them or not."

card.name: Rafiki - Mysterious Sage
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

prop.Flavor: "The past can hurt. But the way I see it, you can either run from it or learn from it."
"Reindeer comin' through!" - Kristoff

card.name: The Queen - Wicked and Vain
card.text: I SUMMON THEE: ↷ - Draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Sublime beauty matched with peerless cunning. Is there any question who is fairest?"
"When you simply must have the hautest couture."

card.name: Tinker Bell - Peter Pan's Ally
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) LOYAL AND DEVOTED: Your characters named Peter Pan gain Challenger +1.

card.name: Ursula - Power Hungry
card.text: IT'S TOO EASY!: When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore. You may draw a card for each 1 lore lost this way.

prop.Flavor: The first rule of Villainy: If you're going to be evil, you've got to have style.

card.name: Yzma - Alchemist
card.text: YOU'RE EXCUSED: Whenever this character quests, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck

prop.Flavor: "When I want your opinion, I will give it to you!"

card.name: Zeus - God of Lightning
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) Challenger +4 (While challenging, this character get +4※.)

prop.Flavor: "A little lightning solves a whole lot of problems."

card.name: Befuddle.
card.text: Return a character or item with cost 2 or less to their player's hand.

prop.Flavor: "Never be afraid to have your mind boggled now and then."

card.name: Freeze
card.text: Exert chosen opposing character.

prop.Flavor: "It's time for you to chill."

card.name: Friends on the Other Side
card.text: (A character with cost 3 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Draw 2 Cards

prop.Flavor: "The cards, the cards the cards will tell . . ."

card.name: Reflection
card.text: (A character with cost 1 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put them back on the top of your deck in any order.

prop.Flavor: "When will my reflection show Who I am inside?"

card.name: Magic Mirror
card.text: Speak! - ↷, 4⬡ - Draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "What wouldst thou know, my Queen?"

card.name: Ursula's Cauldron
card.text: PEER INTO THE DEPTHS: ↷ - Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one on the top of your deck and the other on the bottom.

prop.Flavor: "Perfect for mixing potions and stealing voices."

card.name: White Rabbit's Pocket Watch
card.text: I'M LATE!: ↷, 1⬡ - Chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

prop.Flavor: "No wonder you're late. Why, this watch is exactly two days slow." - The Mad Hatter

card.name: Aladdin - Prince Ali
card.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

prop.Flavor: "Fabulously wealthy. Practically untouchable. Genuinely inauthentic."

card.name: Beast - Wolfsbane
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) ROAR: When you play this character, exert all opposing damaged characters.

prop.Flavor: "I'll take on all of you if I have to!"

card.name: Cheshire Cat - Not All There
card.text: LOSE SOMETHING?: When this character is challenged and banished, banish the challenging character.

prop.Flavor: "You may have noticed that I'm not all there myself."

card.name: Cruella De Vil - Miserable as Usual
card.text: YOU'LL BE SORRY!: When this character is challenged and banished, you may return chosen character to their player's hand.

prop.Flavor: When she stops by, misery is company.
"Sorcery! I knew there was something dubious going on here."

card.name: Flynn Rider - Charming Rogue
card.text: HERE COMES THE SMOLDER: Whenever this character is challenged, the challenging player chooses and discards a card.

prop.Flavor: "I didn't want to have to do this, but you leave me no choice. . . ."

card.name: Genie - On the Job
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) DISAPPEAR: When you play this character, you may return chosen character to their player's hand.

prop.Flavor: "Can your friends go 'Abracadabra, let 'er rip' and then make the sucker disappear?"

card.name: Genie - Powers Unleashed
card.text: Shift 6 (You may pay 6⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Genie.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) PHENOMENAL COSMIC POWER!: Whenever this character quests, you may play an action with cost 5 or less for free.

prop.Flavor: "You can wish for nearly anything! Do you want the short version, or should I give you the whole song and dance?"
"Rules are like older siblings. All they do is get in the way."
"Well, they ain't in here, Jasper."

card.name: Iago - Loud-Mouthed Parrot
card.text: YOU GOT A PROBLEM?: ↷ - Chosen character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

card.name: Jasper - Common Crook
card.text: PUPPYNAPPING: Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character can't quest during their next turn.

prop.Flavor: "Now, look here, Horace, I warned you about thinkin'."

card.name: John Silver - Alien Pirate
card.text: PICK YOUR FIGHTS: When you play this character and whenever he quests, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

prop.Flavor: "Don't be too put off by this . . . hunk of hardware."
"Created something? Ha! But that would be irresponsible and unethical. I would never, ever . . . make more than one."

card.name: Kuzco - Temperamental Emperor
card.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) NO TOUCHY!: When this character is challenged and banished, you may banish the challenging character.

prop.Flavor: "I asked for emerald and that is clearly jade! What is wrong with you people?"

card.name: Lady Tremaine - Wicked Stepmother
card.text: DO IT AGAIN!: When you play this character, you may return an action card from your discard to your hand.

prop.Flavor: "If your chores are done, then clearly you don't have enough of them."

card.name: Mad Hatter - Gracious Host
card.text: TEA PARTY: Whenever this character is challenged, you may draw a card.

prop.Flavor: Mad Hatter: "Would you like a little more tea?" Alice: "I haven't had any yet, so I can't very well take more."

card.name: Megara - Pulling the Strings
card.text: WONDER BOY: When you play this character, chosen character gets +2※ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "A deal's a deal. But falling in love was never supposed to be a part of it."

card.name: Mickey Mouse - Artful Rogue
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.) MISDIRECTION: Whenever you play an action, chosen opposing character can't quest during their next turn.

prop.Flavor: "Quiet as a... well, you know."
"On rivers throughout the Inklands, the little steamboat's whistle answers the cheery tunes of its pilot."

card.name: Mother Gothel - Selfish Manipulator
card.text: SKIP THE DRAMA, STAY WITH MAMA: While this character is exerted, opposing characters can't quest.

prop.Flavor: "Great. Now I'm the bad guy."

card.name: Peter Pan - Never Landing
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "What's the matter, Hook? Can't you fly?"
"Someday, I'll grow up to be the most crabulous crustacean the world has ever seen!"

card.name: Tinker Bell - Most Helpful
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) PIXIE DUST: When you play this character, chosen character gains Evasive this turn.

card.name: Do It Again!
card.text: Return an action card from your discard to your hand.

prop.Flavor: ". . . Then scrub the terrace, sweep the halls and the stairs, clean the chimneys. And of course there's the mending, and the sewing, and the laundry . . ." - Lady Tremaine

card.name: Mother Knows Best
card.text: (A character with cost 3 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Return chosen character to their player's hand.

prop.Flavor: "One way or another Something will go wrong, I swear"

card.name: Stampede.
card.text: Deal 2 damage to chosen damaged character.

prop.Flavor: "A wildebeest stampede is like a raging river: best experienced from a distance."

card.name: Steal From The Rich
card.text: Whenever one of your characters quests this turn, each opponent loses 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Wonder how much ol' Prince John spent on all those fancy locks." - Little John

card.name: Sudden Chill
card.text: (A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Each opponent chooses and discards a card.

prop.Flavor: "Cruella De Vil, Cruella De Vil, If she doesn't scare you, no evil thing will"

card.name: The Beast is Mine!
card.text: Chosen character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

prop.Flavor: "It's only fitting that the finest hunter get the foulest beast!" - Gaston

card.name: Vicious Betrayal.
card.text: Chosen character gets +2※ this turn. If a villain character is chosen, they get +3※ instead.

prop.Flavor: "A true king takes matters into his own claws." - Scar

card.name: Dr. Facilier's Cards
card.text: THE CARDS WILL TELL: ↷ - You pay 1⬡ less for the next action you play this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Take a little trip into your future with me!" - Dr. Facilier

card.name: Stolen Scimitar
card.text: SLASH: ↷ - Chosen character gets +1※ this turn. If a character named Aladdin is chosen, he get +2※ instead.

prop.Flavor: "Sometimes you've got to take what you can get."
"Someday, Abu, things are gonna change. We'll be rich, live in a palace, and never have any problems at all." - Aladdin

card.name: Aladdin - Heroic Outlaw
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Aladdin.) DARING EXPLOIT: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you gain 2 lore and each opponent loses 2 lore.

card.name: Aladdin - Street Rat
card.text: IMPROVISE: When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "It can be hard to tell the difference between a diamond in the rough and someone who's just, well, rough."
"Barking signal. It's an alert. Report to the Colonel at once!"

card.name: Captain Hook - Ruthless Pirate
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) YOU COWARD!: While this character is exerted, opposing characters with Evasive gain Reckless. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

prop.Flavor: "You wouldn't dare fight old hook man-to-man!"
"Who you callin' boisterous, buster?"

card.name: Elsa - Ice Surfer
card.text: THAT'S NO BLIZZARD!: Whenever you play a character named Anna, ready this character. This character can't quest for the rest of this turn.

prop.Flavor: "My sister has always been there for me. I need to be there for her."

card.name: Gaston - Arrogant Hunter
card.text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

prop.Flavor: It's not arrogance when you really are the best.

card.name: Goofy - Daredevil
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "Sometimes you gotta give it the ol' jump and hyuck."

card.name: LeFou - Instigator
card.text: FAN THE FLAMES: When you play this character, ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

prop.Flavor: "All a mob needs is a push in the wrong direction."

card.name: Maleficent - Monstrous Dragon
card.text: DRAGON FIRE: When you play this character, you may banish chosen character.

prop.Flavor: The ninth Rule of Villainy: When all else fails, turn into a dragon.

card.name: Maui - Hero to All
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

prop.Flavor: "What I believe you were trying to say is 'Thank you.'"

card.name: Mickey Mouse - Brave Little Tailor
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: When defeat looms and victory hangs by a thread, a hero bolts to the rescue, patching things up through shear determination.
"Her fashion sense is always spot on."

card.name: Moana - Chosen by the Ocean
card.text: This Is Not Who You Are - When you play this character, you may banish chosen character named Te Ka.

prop.Flavor: "You know who you are."

card.name: Mulan - Imperial Soldier
card.text: LEAD BY EXAMPLE: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, your other characters get +1◆ this turn.

card.name: Peter Pan - Fearless Fighter
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

prop.Flavor: "Nobody calls Pan a coward and lives! I'll fight you man-to-man, with one hand behind my back."

card.name: Pongo - Ol' Rascal
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "At first I had no particular plan, just anything to attract attention. You know, stir things up a bit."

card.name: Rapunzel - Letting Down Her Hair
card.text: TANGLE: When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Who are you? And how did you find me?"
"Consumed by the flames of ambition."

card.name: Scar - Shameless Firebrand
card.text: Shift 6 (You may pay 6⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Scar.) ROUSING SPEECH: When you play this character, ready your characters with cost 3 or less. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

prop.Flavor: "The time has come to take what is ours!"
"Yes, sir. Righto, sir. Right away, sir!"
"His destructive programming is taking effect. He will be irresistibly drawn to large cities, where he will back up sewers, reverse street signs, and steal everyone's left shoe." - Jumba Jookiba

card.name: Te Ka - The Burning One
card.text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

prop.Flavor: "She burns for that which was stolen from her."

card.name: Tigger - Wonderful Thing
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "I'm the bounciest bouncer that ever bounced!"

card.name: Be Prepared
card.text: (A character with cost 7 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Banish all Characters.

prop.Flavor: "Our teeth and ambitions are bared!"

card.name: Cut to the Chase
card.text: Chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

prop.Flavor: "Surprise!"

card.name: Dragon Fire
card.text: Banish chosen character.

prop.Flavor: Rare is the hero who can withstand a dragon's wrath.

card.name: Fan the Flames
card.text: Ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Pretty words can move a crowd, but so can ugly ones."

card.name: He's Got a Sword!
card.text: Chosen Character gets +2※ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "We've all got swords!" - Razoul

card.name: Tangle.
card.text: Each opponent loses 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Stay right there! I mean, you don't have a choice, I guess. But still! Don't move!" - Rapunzel

card.name: Poisoned Apple
card.text: TAKE A BITE . . .: 1⬡, Banish this item - Exert chosen character. If a princess character is chosen, banish her instead.

prop.Flavor: "One taste of the poisoned apple, and the victim's eyes will close forever...." - The Queen

card.name: Shield of Virtue
card.text: FIREPROOF: ↷, 3⬡ - Ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Arm thyself with this enchanted Shield of Virtue and this mighty Sword of Truth, for these weapons of righteousness will triumph over evil." - Flora

card.name: Sword Of Truth
card.text: FINAL ENCHANTMENT: Banish this item - Banish chosen villain character.

prop.Flavor: "Almost as powerful as True Love's Kiss."

card.name: Ariel - Whoseit Collector
card.text: LOOK AT THIS STUFF: Whenever you play an item, you may ready this character.

prop.Flavor: "You want thingamabobs? I got twenty."

card.name: Aurora - Briar Rose
card.text: DISARMING BEAUTY: When you play this character, chosen character gets -2※ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "There was something strange about that voice. Too beautiful to be real . . ." - Prince Phillip

card.name: Aurora - Dreaming Guardian
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Aurora.) PROTECTIVE EMBRACE: Your other characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

prop.Flavor: "As the princess slumbered, her power awoke."
"They say if you dream a thing more than once, it's sure to come true!"

card.name: Belle - Inventive Engineer
card.text: TINKER: Whenever this character quests, you pay 1⬡ less for the next item you play this turn.

prop.Flavor: "A little ingenuity and a lot of heart will take you far in this world."

card.name: Belle - Strange but Special

card.name: Bucky - Squirrel Squeak Tutor
card.text: SQUEAK: Whenever you play a Floodborn character, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

prop.Flavor: "There's a lot of nuance to squirrel." - Kronk

"Alice felt quite confused. "But I don't see much ink here at all. How can the flood still be changing the Inklands?" "Things are always changing, you know," said the cat. "It would be a change if they didn't."

card.name: Cheshire Cat - From the Shadows
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Cheshire Cat.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) WICKED SMILE: ↷ - Banish chosen damaged character.

card.name: Daisy Duck - Secret Agent
card.text: THWART: Whenever this character quests, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

card.name: Donald Duck - Perfect Gentleman
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Donald Duck.) ALLOW ME: At the start of your turn, each player may draw a card.

card.name: Donald Duck - Sleepwalker
card.text: STARTLED AWAKE: Whenever you play an action, this character gets +2※ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Heading toward a rude awakening!"

card.name: Dr. Facilier - Fortune Teller
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) YOU'RE IN MY WORLD: Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character can't quest during their next turn.

card.name: Enchantress - Unexpected Judge
card.text: TRUE FORM: While being challenged, this character gets +2※.

prop.Flavor: "Appearances can be deceiving."
"I love a good fan club, but they could at least try to get the nose right!"

card.name: Flynn Rider - His Own Biggest Fan
card.text: Shift 2 (You may 2⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Flynn Rider.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) ONE LAST, BIG SCORE: This character gets -1◆ for each card in your opponents' hands.

card.name: Gaston - Scheming Suitor
card.text: YES, I'M INTIMIDATING: While one or more opponents have no cards in their hands, this character gets +3※.

prop.Flavor: "Don't I deserve the best?"
"What's the rush, Rob? Take a load off! There's plenty of time to go lookin' for lore lost in that crazy ink."

card.name: Lucifer - Cunning Cat
card.text: MOUSE CATCHER: When you play this character, each opponent chooses and discards either 2 cards or 1 action card.

prop.Flavor: "There must be something good about him." - Cinderella

card.name: Pain - Underworld Imp
card.text: COMING, YOUR MOST LUGUBRIOUSNESS: While this character has 5※ or more, he gets +2◆.

prop.Flavor: "Get a move on! I'm a busy god, lots to do-meetings, curses, a little light scheming." - Hades

card.name: Panic - Underworld Imp
card.text: I CAN HANDLE IT: When you play this character, chosen character gets +2※ this turn. If the chosen character is named Pain, he gets +4※ instead.

prop.Flavor: "Who says it's hard to find good help these days? Oh yeah... ME!" - Hades

card.name: Pete - Bad Guy
card.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) TAKE THAT!: Whenever you play an action, this character gets +2※ this turn. WHO'S NEXT?: While this character has 7※ or more, he gets +2◆.

card.name: Prince John - Greediest of All
card.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) I SENTENCE YOU: Whenever your opponents discards 1 or more cards, you may draw a card for each card discarded.

prop.Flavor: "Taxes! Taxes! Beautiful, lovely taxes!"

card.name: Queen Of Hearts - Quick-Tempered
card.text: ROYAL RAGE: When you play this character, deal 1 damage to chosen damaged opposing character.

prop.Flavor: "You know, we could make her really angry. Shall we try?" - Cheshire Cat

card.name: Ratigan - Criminal Mastermind
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "I've outdone myself this time! Soon I will have everything I deserve. Riches... power... an entire kingdom at my feet!"

card.name: Ray - Easygoing Firefly
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "He may be hard to follow, but his heart isn't."

card.name: The Queen - Disguised Peddler
card.text: A PERFECT DISGUISE: ↷, Choose and discard a character card - Gain lore equal to the discarded character's◆.

prop.Flavor: "This is no ordinary apple..."
"Finding your true self will set your heart aglow."
"I must make the hard decisions to protect my daughter, especially in this unfamiliar world."

card.name: Bibbidi Bobbidi Boo
card.text: (A character with cost 3 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Return chosen character of your to your hand to play another character with the same cost or less for free.

prop.Flavor: "It'll do magic, believe it or not"

card.name: Bounce
card.text: Return chosen character of yours to your hand to return another chosen character to their player's hand.

prop.Flavor: "Are you ready for some bouncing?" - Tigger

card.name: Hypnotize
card.text: Each Opponent chooses and discards a card. Draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Look me in the eye when I'm speaking to you."

card.name: Improvise
card.text: Chosen Character gets +1※ this turn. Draw a card.

prop.Flavor: Shan-Yu: "It looks like you're out of ideas." Mulan: "Not quite!"

card.name: Pack Tactics
card.text: Gain 1 lore for each damaged character opponents have in play.

prop.Flavor: Pacha: "You want to survive the jungle? Start thinking like you belong here." Kuzco: "No problem... Grrr, look at me, I'm a jaguar."

card.name: Ring The Bell
card.text: Banish chosen damaged character.

prop.Flavor: "I'm afraid that you've gone and upset me." - Ratigan

card.name: Ratigan's Marvelous Trap
card.text: SNAP! BOOM! TWANG!: Banish this item - Each opponent loses 2 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Simple in purpose, elaborate in execution - just like Ratigan."
"The bees are buzzin' in the tree to make some honey just for me!"
"If you see hungry faces, send 'em my way."
"You'll have to deal with them sooner or later."

card.name: Donald Duck - Not Again!
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) PHOOEY!: This character gets +1◆ for each 1 damage on him.

card.name: Felicia - Always Hungry
card.text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

prop.Flavor: "This isn't how most cat-and-mouse games go, is it, Dr. Dawson?" - Basil

card.name: Fidget - Ratigan's Henchman
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "When a normal henchman just won't cut it."

card.name: Honest John - Not That Honest
card.text: Easy Street - Whenever you play a Floodborn character, each opponent loses 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "A thing like that ought to be worth a fortune to someone!"

card.name: Lady Tremaine - Imperious Queen
card.text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Lady Tremaine.) POWER TO RULE AT LAST: When you play this character, each opponent chooses and banishes one of their characters.

prop.Flavor: The twelfth Rule of Villainy: If you don't have a throne, take one.

card.name: Lady Tremaine - Overbearing Matriarch
card.text: Not For You - When you play this character, each opponent with more lore than you loses 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Make no mistake: this time I will make certain the key remains safe!"
"When things heat up, no one can hold a candle to him."

card.name: Minnie Mouse - Stylish Surfer
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "This goes into my top ten most fun things!"

card.name: Minnie Mouse - Wide-Eyed Diver
card.text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Minnie Mouse.) Evasive (Only Characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) UNDERSEA ADVENTURE: Whenever you play a second action in a turn, this character gets +2◆ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Zero to fun in under 3 seconds!"

card.name: Mother Gothel - Withered and Wicked
card.text: WHAT HAVE YOU DONE?!: This character enters play with 3 damage.

prop.Flavor: "Her feelings are written all over her face."

card.name: Mulan - Soldier in Training
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

prop.Flavor: "I have to do something!"

card.name: Namaari - Nemesis
card.text: THIS SHOULDN'T TAKE LONG: ↷, Banish this character - Banish chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "I don't need swords to beat you. They just make it more fun."

card.name: Queen Of Hearts - Impulsive Ruler
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

prop.Flavor: "The glow of lore in the flood caught here eye. "The spellbook!" she cried. "Don't let it get away!"

card.name: Queen Of Hearts - Sensing Weakness
card.text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Queen of Hearts.) LET THE GAME BEING: Whenever one of your characters challenges another character, you may draw a card.

card.name: Ratigan - Very Large Mouse
card.text: THIS IS MY KINGDOM: When you play this character, exert chosen opposing character with 3※ or less. Choose one of your characters and read them. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

prop.Flavor: "This time, nothing, not even Basil, can stand in my way!"

card.name: Raya - Headstrong
card.text: NOTE TO SELF, DON'T DIE: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may ready this character. She can't quest for the rest of this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Two parts of bravery, one part cleverness, and a whole lot of determination."

card.name: Raya - Leader of Heart
card.text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Raya.) CHAMPION OF KUMANDRA: Whenever this character challenges a damaged character, she takes no damage from the challenge.

prop.Flavor: "My ba dreams of a united Kumandra. I fight to honor that dream."

card.name: Scar - Vicious Cheater
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) DADDY ISN'T HERE TO SAVE YOU: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn.

card.name: Shere Khan - Menacing Predator
card.text: DON'T INSULT MY INTELLIGENCE: Whenever one of your characters challenges another character, gain 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: The sixth Rule of Villainy: Keep your mind sharp and your claws sharper.

card.name: Tigger - One of a Kind
card.text: ENERGETIC: Whenever you play an action, this character gets +2※ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Bouncing in to save the day!"

card.name: Tuk Tuk - Wrecking Ball
card.text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

prop.Flavor: "A good friend is always ready to roll."

card.name: Go The Distance
card.text: (A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Ready chosen damaged character of yours. They can't quest for the rest of this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Teeth and Ambitions
card.text: (A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Deal 2 damage to chosen character of yours to deal 2 damaged to another chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "Of course, quid pro quo, you're expected To take certain duties on board"

card.name: The Most Diabolical Scheme
card.text: (A character with cost 3 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Banish chosen Villain of your to banish chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "Now comes the real tour de force Tricky and wicked, of course"

card.name: What Did You Call Me?
card.text: Chosen damaged character gets +3※ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "No one can have a higher opinion of your than I have, and I think you're a slimy, contemptible sewer rat!" - Basil

card.name: You Can Fly!
card.text: (A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Chosen character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

card.name: Dinner Bell
card.text: YOU KNOW WHAT HAPPENS: ↷, 2⬡ - Draw cards equal to the damage on chosen character of yours, then banish them.

prop.Flavor: "The delicate sound of impending doom."

card.name: Peter Pan's Dagger
card.text: You characters with Evasive get +1※.

prop.Flavor: "Like so much other lore, Peter Pan's dagger was safe in the Great Illuminary until the flood."

card.name: Sword in the Stone
card.text: ↷, 2⬡ - Chosen character gets +1※ this turn for each 1 damage on them.

prop.Flavor: "Whoso pulleth out this sword of this stone and anvil is rightwise king born of England."

card.name: Alice - Growing Girl
card.text: GOOD ADVICE: Your other characters gain Support. (Whenever they quest, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.) WHAT DID I DO?: While this character has 10※ or more, she gets +4◆.

card.name: Basil - Great Mouse Detective
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Basil.) THERE'S ALWAYS A CHANCE: If you used Shift to play this character, you may draw 2 cards when he enters play.

prop.Flavor: "A solution always presents itself."

card.name: Basil - Of Baker Street
card.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)

prop.Flavor: "What an ingenious device! If its light is refracted through these, then its images must resolve somewhere below."
"There is no question: something is afoot in the Great Illuminary"
"Keep your tempo."

card.name: Cogsworth - Grandfather Clock
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Cogsworth.) Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) UNWIND: Your other characters gain Resist +1 (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1)

card.name: Cogsworth - Talking Clock
card.text: WAIT A MINUTE: Your characters with Reckless gain "↷ - Gain 1 lore."

prop.Flavor: "This has gone far enough. I'm in charge here."

card.name: Cruella De Vil - Fashionable Cruiser
card.text: NOW GET GOING: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

prop.Flavor: "Isn't it just gorgeous darling? And just as stylish as I am."

card.name: Cruella De Vil - Perfectly Wretched
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Cruella De Vil.) OH, NO YOU DON'T: Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character gets -2※ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "It's ink couture, darling. I wear only the best!"

card.name: Duke Weaselton - Small-Time Crook
card.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

prop.Flavor: "It's Wee-sel-ton."

card.name: Gaston - Intellectual Powerhouse
card.text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Gaston.) DEVELOPED BRAIN: When you play this character, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put one into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Grand Pabbie - Oldest and Wisest
card.text: ANCIENT INSIGHT: Whenever you remove 1 or more damage from one of your characters, gain 2 lore.

prop.Flavor: "When he talks, even the sky listens."

card.name: Hiram Flaversham - Toymaker
card.text: ARTIFICER: When you play this character and whenever he quests, you may banish one of your items to draw 2 cards.

prop.Flavor: "His creations are even more wondrous with the Illuminary's resources at his fingertips."

card.name: James - Role Model
card.text: NEVER, EVER LOSE SIGHT: When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

card.name: Jasmine - Heir of Agrabah
card.text: I'M A FAST LEARNER: When you play this character, remove up to 1 damage from chosen character of yours.

prop.Flavor: "She may be young, but she's got the spirit of a true leader"

card.name: Judy Hopps - Optimistic Officer
card.text: DON'T CALL ME CUTE: When you play this character, you may banish chosen item. Its player draws a card.

prop.Flavor: "I'll get to the bottom of what happened with that locked lorebook. You can count on me!"

card.name: Mrs. Judson - Housekeeper
card.text: TIDY UP: Whenever you play a Floodborn character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

prop.Flavor: "I know just the thing. Let me fetch you a pot of tea and some of my fresh cheese crumpets."

card.name: Nick Wilde - Wily Fox
card.text: IT'S CALLED A HUSTLE: When play this character, you may return an item card name Pawpsicle from your discard to your hand.

prop.Flavor: "It's criminal how good these things taste!"

card.name: Noi - Orphaned Thief
card.text: HIDE AND SEEK: While you have an item in play, this character gains Resist +1 and Ward. (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1. Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

prop.Flavor: "For instance, based on the quality of the light and the subtle change in wind direction, I can safely say that it is time for tea."

card.name: Prince Charming - Heir to the Throne

prop.Flavor: "He'd searched across the Inklands for the young woman who'd stolen his heart at the ball, only to find more mysteries."
Pooh: "Isn't there anybody here at all?" Rabbit: "Nobody!" Pooh: "Somebody's there... because somebody must have said 'Nobody.'"

card.name: Sisu - Divine Water Dragon
card.text: I TRUST YOU: Whenever this character quests, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. You may put one into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

prop.Flavor: "No matter her shape, you can't mistake her heart."

card.name: The Nokk - Water Spirit
card.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

prop.Flavor: "As elusive as water."

card.name: Winnie The Pooh - Having A Think
card.text: HUNNY POT: Whenever this character quests, you may put a card from your hand into your inkwell facedown.

prop.Flavor: "When he though, he though in the most thoughtful way he could think."

card.name: Falling Down The Rabbit Hole
card.text: Each player chooses one of their characters and puts them into their inkwell facedown and excreted.

prop.Flavor: "Down, down, down she went, floating in a swirl of ink. How curious!"

card.name: Four Dozen Eggs
card.text: (A character with cost 3 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free) Your characters gain Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

card.name: Launch.
card.text: Banish chosen item of yours to deal 5 damage to chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "Ready... aim... coconut?"

card.name: Nothing to Hide
card.text: Each Opponent reveals their hand. Draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Helps you avoid unpleasant surprises."

card.name: Fang Crossbow
card.text: CAREFUL AIM: ↷, 2⬡ - Chosen character get -2※ this turn. STAY BACK!: ↷, Banish this item - Banish chosen Dragon character.

card.name: Gumbo Pot
card.text: THE BEST I'VE EVER TASTED: ↷ - Remove 1 damage each from up to 2 chosen characters.

prop.Flavor: "A gift this special just got to to be shared." - James

card.name: Maurice's Workshop
card.text: LOOKING FOR THIS: Whenever you play another item, you may pay 1⬡ to draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "The solution you need could be just a few adjustments away."

card.name: Pawpsicle
card.text: JUMBO POP: When you play this item, you may draw a card. THAT'S REDWOOD: Banish this item - Remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

card.name: Sardine Can
card.text: FLIGHT CABIN: Your exerted characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

prop.Flavor: "Flight 3759 boarding now! Let's go get that lore!" - Orville

card.name: Beast - Forbidding Recluse
card.text: YOU'RE NOT WELCOME HERE: When you play this character, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "Woe to the one who draws his gaze."

card.name: Beast - Selfless Protector
card.text: SHIELD ANOTHER: Whenever one of your other character would be dealt damage, put that many damage counters on this character instead.

prop.Flavor: "You'll have to go through me first."

card.name: Beast - Tragic Hero
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Beast.) IT'S BETTER THIS WAY: At the start of your turn, if this character has no damage, draw a card. Otherwise, he gets +4※ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "It must be my destiny–to remain a beast forever."

card.name: Benja - Guardian of the Dragon Gem
card.text: WE HAVE A CHOICE: When you play this character, you may banish chosen item.

prop.Flavor: "Don't mistake spirit for skill."

card.name: Chief Bogo - Respected Officer
card.text: INSUBORDINATION!: Whenever you play a Floodborn character, deal 1 damage to each opposing character.

prop.Flavor: "We can confirm the ink flood was caused by an explosion. We have it under control–now clear the area."

card.name: Cinderella - Knight in Training
card.text: HAVE COURAGE: When you play this character, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

prop.Flavor: She's always had the heart of a champion–now she'll have the skills, too.

card.name: Cinderella - Stouthearted
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Cinderella.) Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.) THE SINGING SWORD: Whenever you play a song, this character may challenge ready characters this turn.

prop.Flavor: "You go ahead, Minnie! I'm going to see if there's any lore over here."
"I don't suppose y'all could whip up some more magical beignets with them inkcasters?"
"It's a banner day for Sir Goofy, who is steeled to prove his mettle against anyone courting trouble-jouse in case."

card.name: Hercules - Divine Hero
card.text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Hercules.)\ Resist +2 (Damage dealth to this character is reduced by 2.)

prop.Flavor: "A good guy to have around when something wrecks your inkworks."
"No need to call IX-I-I!"

card.name: Jafar - Dreadnought
card.text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Jafar.)\ NOW WHERE WERE WE?: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may draw a card.

card.name: Jafar - Royal Vizier
card.text: I DON'T TRUST HIM, SIRE: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

prop.Flavor: "Soon you'll learn who holds the real power!"

card.name: Kronk - Junior Chipmunk
card.text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)\ SCOUT LEADER: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may deal 2 damage to chosen character.

card.name: Lawrence - Jealous Manservant
card.text: PAYBACK: While this character has no damage, he gets +4※.

prop.Flavor: "In this new world, the crown could finally be his."

card.name: Li Shang - Archery Instructor
card.text: ARCHERY LESSON: Whenever this character quests, your characters gain Evasive this turn. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

prop.Flavor: "Learn what to do, then learn to do it without thought."

card.name: Magic Broom - Industrial Model
card.text: MAKE IT SHINE: When you play this character, chosen character gains Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

prop.Flavor: "Even with a hauling weight of "seriously, a lot," it can only do so much in a magical flood."

card.name: Namaari - Morning Mist
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)\ BLADES: This character can challenge ready characters.

prop.Flavor: "Don't be fooled by the folksy peasant look." - Kuzco
"All he's got is his charm."

card.name: Queen of Hearts - Capricious Monarch
card.text: OFF WITH THEIR HEADS!: Whenever an opposing character is banished, you may ready this character.

prop.Flavor: The forth Rule of Villainy: Do whatever it takes to get ahead.

card.name: Robin Hood - Capable Fighter
card.text: SKIRMISH: ↷ - Deal 1 damage to chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "Capable? You don't know the half of it." - Little John

card.name: The Huntsman - Reluctant Enforcer
card.text: CHANGE OF HEART: Whenever this character quests, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

prop.Flavor: "Run away, hide! In the woods, anywhere!"

card.name: The Prince - Never Gives Up
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)\ Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

card.name: Tiana - Celebrating Princess
card.text: Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.)\ WHAT YOU GIVE IS WHAT YOU GET: While this character is exerted and you have no cards in your hand, opponents can't play actions.

prop.Flavor: "My place is going be special, with great food to fill people's bellies and hot jazz to feed their souls!"

card.name: Charge!
card.text: Chosen character gains Challenger +2 and Resist +2 this turn. (They get +2※ while challenging. Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

prop.Flavor: "Sometime subtlety is required. This is not one of those times."

card.name: Let The Storm Rage On
card.text: (A character with cost 3 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)\ Deal 2 damaged to chosen character. Draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "The cold never bothered me anyway"

card.name: Pick a Fight
card.text: Chosen character can challenge ready characters this turn.

prop.Flavor: "I'm gonna wreck it!"

card.name: Strength of a Raging Fire
card.text: (A character with cost 3 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Deal damage to chosen character equal to the number of characters you have in play.

prop.Flavor: "Tranquil as a forest\ But on fire within"

card.name: Last Cannon
card.text: ARM YOURSELF: 1⬡, Banish this item - Chosen character gains Challenger +3 this turn. (They get +3※ while challenging.)

prop.Flavor: "One shot can change everything."

card.name: Mouse Armor
card.text: PROTECTION: ↷ - Chosen character gains Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

prop.Flavor: "Built by the tiniest of hands for the bravest of hearts."

card.name: Weight Set
card.text: TRAINING: Whenever you play a character with 4※ or more, you may pay 1⬡ to draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Personally endorsed by Hercules himselff!"

card.name: Baloo - von Bruinwald XIII
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) LET'S MAKE LIKE A TREE: When this character is banished, gain 2 lore.

card.name: Bernard - Brand-New Agent
card.text: I'LL CHECK IT OUT: At the end of your turn, if this character is exerted, you may ready another chosen character of yours.

prop.Flavor: "You stay there. I'll look for scattered lore."

card.name: Chernabog - Evildoer
card.text: THE POWER OF EVIL: For each character card in your discard, you pay 1⬡ less to play this character. SUMMON THE SPIRITS: When you play this character, shuffle all character cards from your discard into your deck.

prop.Flavor: "Darkness calls to minions everywhere"

card.name: Dalmatian Puppy - Tail Wagger
card.text: WHERE DID THEY ALL COME FROM?: You may have up to 99 copies of Dalmatian Puppy - Tail Wagger in your deck.

prop.Flavor: "First they steal your heart. Then they steal your chair."

card.name: Dalmatian Puppy - Tail Wagger (a)
card.text: WHERE DID THEY ALL COME FROM?: You may have up to 99 copies of Dalmatian Puppy - Tail Wagger in your deck.

prop.Flavor: "First they steal your heart. Then they steal your chair."

card.text: WHERE DID THEY ALL COME FROM?: You may have up to 99 copies of Dalmatian Puppy - Tail Wagger in your deck.
