card.name: Joshua Sweet - The Doctor
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

prop.Flavor: "Heading out into the Inklands? Come on back if you need patching up."
"Welcome to the Inklands."

card.name: Kida - Protector of Atlantis
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Kida.) PERHAPS WE CAN SAVE OUR FUTURE: When you play this character, all characters get -3※ until the start of your next turn.

prop.Flavor: "She has been chosen." - King Kashekim Nedakh

card.name: Lucky - The 15th Puppy
card.text: GOOD AS NEW: ↷ - Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put each character card with cost 2 or less into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. PUPPY LOVE: Whenever this character quests, if you have 4 or more other characters in play, your other characters get +1◆ this turn.

card.name: Minnie Mouse - Musical Artist
card.text: Singer 3 (This character counts as cost 3 to sing songs.) ENTOURAGE: Whenever you play a character with Bodyguard, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "Her musical talents are off the charts!"

card.name: Miss Bianca - Rescue Aid Society Agent
card.text: Singer 4 (This character counts as cost 4 to sing songs.)

prop.Flavor: "Our society has never failed to answer a call for help." - Mr. Chairman
"This is simple, Snoops! I want that lore! The one that shines like a diamond!" - Madame Medusa

card.name: Nani - Protective Sister
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

prop.Flavor: "Let me handle this, Lilo."
"Boy, look at those things go! Whaddya call 'em? Inkrunners? I wish I could fly like that."

card.name: Patch - Intimidating Pup
card.text: BARK: ↷ - Chosen character gets -2※ until the start of your next turn.

prop.Flavor: "Just like Thunderbolt, he'll stand up to any bad guy."

card.name: Perdita - Devoted Mother
card.text: COME ALONG, CHILDREN: When you play this character and whenever she quests, you may play a character with cost 2 or less from your discard for free.

prop.Flavor: "Her pups will follow her anywhere."

card.name: Piglet - Pooh Pirate Captain
card.text: AND I'M THE CAPTAIN!: While you have 2 or more other characters in play, this character gets +2◆.

prop.Flavor: "Ahoy! There's lore out there, and I'm g-gonna find it!"

card.name: Pluto - Determined Defender
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Pluto.) Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) GUARD DOG: At the start of your turn, remove up to 3 damage from this character.

card.name: Pluto - Friendly Pooch
card.text: GOOD DOG: ↷ - You pay 1⬡ less for the next character you play this turn.

prop.Flavor: "He just can't wait for new friends to arrive!"

card.name: Pongo - Determined Father
card.text: TWILIGHT BARK: Once per turn, you may pay 2⬡ to reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, Put it on the bottom of your deck.

prop.Flavor: "We'll find our way. I know we will!"

card.name: Queen of Hearts - Wonderland Empress
card.text: ALL WAYS HERE ARE MY WAYS: Whenever this character quests, your other Villain characters get +1◆ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "The more of the Inklands she claims, the more she wants."

card.name: Rolly - Hungry Pup
card.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)

prop.Flavor: "I'm hungry, Mother. I really am."

card.name: Tinker Bell - Generous Fairy
card.text: MAKE A NEW FRIEND: When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of our deck in any order.

prop.Flavor: "Plenty of berries - and friendship - to go around."
"With Tink's upgrades in place, Wendy took them to the skies to find the missing mermaid."

card.name: 99 Puppies
card.text: Whenever one of your characters quests this turn, gain 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Two, four, six, plus three is nine, plus two is 11 . . ." - Roger

card.name: Boss's Orders
card.text: Chosen character gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)

prop.Flavor: "Snoops! I know you can look harder! Find me that lore!" - Madame Medusa

card.name: Heal What Has Been Hurt
card.text: (A character with cost 3 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Remove up to 3 damage from chosen character. Draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Let your power shine Make the clock reverse . . ."

card.name: Quick Patch
card.text: Remove up to 3 damage from chosen location

prop.Flavor: "Good as new! Well, almost."

card.name: The Bare Necessities
card.text: (A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a non-character card of your choice.

prop.Flavor: "Forget about your worries and your strife. . . ."

card.name: Cleansing Rainwater
card.text: ANCIENT POWER: Banish this item: Remove up to 2 damage from each of your characters.

prop.Flavor: "Rainwater lands as stone melts and dragons fly again."

card.name: Heart of Atlantis
card.text: LIFE GIVER: ↷ - You pay 2⬡ less for the next character you play this turn.

prop.Flavor: "It's what's keeping you - all of Atlantis - alive!" - Milo Thatch

card.name: Wildcat's Wrench
card.text: REBUILD: ↷ - Remove up to 2 damage from chosen location.

prop.Flavor: "The right tool makes all the difference."
"The mermaids told Peter they'd seen some items floating by several days earlier, but they were more concerned that one of their sisters had gone missing."

card.name: Pride Lands - Pride Rock
card.text: WE ARE ALL CONNECTED: Characters get +2⛨ while here. LION HOME: If you have a Prince or King character here, you pay 1⬡ less to play characters.

card.name: Tiana's Palace - Jazz Restaurant
card.text: NIGHT OUT: Characters can't be challenged while here.

prop.Flavor: "In New Orleans, dreams can come true."

card.name: Alice - Tea Alchemist
card.text: CURIOUSER AND CURIOUSER: ↷ - Exert chosen opposing character and all other opposing characters with the same name.

prop.Flavor: "With the right tea leaves and a little magic, she creates the perfect cup for any party guest."

card.name: Chernabog's Followers - Creatures of Evil
card.text: RESTLESS SOULS: Whenever this character quests, you may banish them to draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Let chaos reign."

card.name: Diablo - Faithful Pet
card.text: LOOKING FOR AURORA: Whenever you play a character named Maleficent, you may look at the top card of your deck. Put it on the top or the bottom of your deck.

prop.Flavor: "With a little ink-enhanced magic, nothing escapes his sight."

card.name: Genie - Supportive Friend
card.text: THREE WISHES: Whenever this character quests, you may shuffle this card into your deck to draw 3 cards.

prop.Flavor: "Right here, direct from the lamp, right here for your very much wish fulfillment."

card.name: Hydros - Ice Titan
card.text: BLIZZARD: ↷ - Exert chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "Freeze Zeus!"

card.name: Iago - Pretty Polly
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "Your majesty certainly has a way with dumb animals." - Jafar

card.name: Jafar - Lamp thief
card.text: I AM YOUR MASTER NOW: When you play this character, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one on the top of your deck and the other on the bottom.

prop.Flavor: "I will rule as far as the eye can see."

card.name: Jafar - Striking Illusionist
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Jafar.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) POWER BEYOND MEASURE: During your turn, while this character is exerted, whenever you draw a card, gain 1 lore.

card.name: Lena Sabrewing - Rebellious Teenager
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

prop.Flavor: "Born from the shadows. Saved by friendship."

card.name: Magic Broom - Dancing Duster
card.text: POWER CLEAN: When you play this character, if you have a Sorcerer character in play, you may exert chosen opposing character. They can't ready at the start of their next turn.

prop.Flavor: "Super-smooth tidiness."

card.name: Magic Broom - Swift Cleaner
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) CLEAN THIS, CLEAN THAT: When you play this character, you may shuffle all Broom cards from your discard into your deck.

prop.Flavor: "Super-speedy tidiness."

card.name: Magic Broom - The Big Sweeper
card.text: CLEAN SWEEP: While this character is at a location, it gets +2※.

prop.Flavor: "Super-sized tidiness."

card.name: Magic Carpet - Flying Rug
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) FIND THE WAY: ↷ - Move a character of yours to a location for free.

prop.Flavor: "Carpet and I can swoop in, grab the lore, and be back before anyone knows it!" - Aladdin
"Feed my power, Dark Eclipse. Free my form from the abyss. Dormant magic now unchain, the Shadow Queen be whole again!"

card.name: Magica De Spell - The Midas Touch
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Magica De Spell.) ALL MINE: Whenever this character quests, gain lore equal to the cost of one of your items in play.

prop.Flavor: "I can feel my powers growing the closer I get to Scrooge's precious dime!"

card.name: Magica De Spell - Thieving Sorceress
card.text: TELEKINESIS: ↷ - Return chosen item with cost equal to or less than this character's ※ to its player's hand.

prop.Flavor: "Do you know what I call this? A good start!"

card.name: Maleficent - Mistress of All Evil
card.text: DARK KNOWLEDGE: Whenever this character quests, you may draw a card. DIVINATION: During your turn, whenever you draw a card, you may move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

card.name: Mama Odie - Voice of Wisdom
card.text: LISTEN TO YOUR MAMA NOW: Whenever this character quests, you may move up to 2 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

prop.Flavor: "That's the way to give it what it needs, Juju!"

card.name: Pua - Potbellied Buddy
card.text: ALWAYS THERE: When this character is banished, you may shuffle this card into your deck.

prop.Flavor: "Always ready to lend a hand . . . er, snout."

card.name: Rafiki - Mystical Fighter
card.text: Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3※.) ANCIENT SKILLS: Whenever he challenges a Hyena character, this character takes no damage from the challenge.

prop.Flavor: "Mind the stick!"

card.name: Stratos - Tornado Titan
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) CYCLONE: ↷ - Gain lore equal to the number of Titan characters you have in play.

prop.Flavor: "Blow Zeus away!"
"It rages through the forest, Wings spread wide with flame Spring sings its ancient chorus And green renews its claim"
"A cobweb's strand to hold her fast An eagle's eye to see her well Sands of time to steal her past Thus I cast my magic spell!"

card.name: Treasure Guardian - Protector of the Cave
card.text: WHO DISTURBS MY SLUMBER?: This character can't challenge or quest unless it is at a location.

prop.Flavor: "Only one may enter here."

card.name: Ursula - Sea Witch
card.text: YOU'RE TOO LATE: Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character can't ready at the start of their next turn.

prop.Flavor: "The secret contract has already been written"

card.name: Bestow a Gift
card.text: Move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

prop.Flavor: "From magic ink I call this gift. Fly my minion, thy wings be swift!" - Maleficent

card.name: It Calls Me
card.text: (A character with cost 1 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Draw a card. Then, choose up to 3 cards from chosen opponent's discard and shuffle them into their deck.

prop.Flavor: "I am everything I've learned and more"

card.name: Last-Ditch Effort.
card.text: Exert chosen opposing character. Then chosen character of yours gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2※ when challenging.)

prop.Flavor: "I got your back."

card.name: The Boss is on a Roll
card.text: (A character with cost 3 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Put any number of them on the top of the bottom of your deck in any order. Gain 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Go ahead! Make your choice!"

card.name: The Lamp
card.text: GOOD OR EVIL: Banish this item - If you have a character named Jafar in play, draw 2 cards. If you have a character named Genie in play, return chosen character with cost 4 or less to their players hand.

card.name: The Sorcerer's Hat
card.text: INCREDIBLE ENERGY: ↷, 1⬡ - Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put that card into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

prop.Flavor: "Minnie approached it carefully. Whoever had placed it here might have prepared traps."
"An eerie quiet surrounds the castle - but beware of the dangerous occupant within."

card.name: The Queen's Castle - Mirror Chamber
card.text: USING THE MIRROR: At the start of your turn, for each character you have here, you may draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Those who visit the mirror can choose their question - but not the answer."

card.name: The Sorcerer's Tower - Wondrous Workspace
card.text: BROOM CLOSET: Your characters named Magic Broom may move here for free. MAGICAL POWER: Characters get +1◆ while here.

prop.Flavor: "Everything you need to make some magic."

card.name: Cubby - Mighty Lost Boy
card.text: THE BEAR: Whenever this character moves to a location, he gets +3※ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "With Peter holding off Hook, Cubby did what he does best: break stuff."

card.name: Cursed Merfolk - Ursula's Handiwork
card.text: POOR SOULS: Whenever this character is challenged, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

prop.Flavor: "Now it's happened once or twice, someone couldn't pay the price . . ." - Ursula

card.name: Don Karnage - Prince of Pirates
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "You didn't expect to find me here, did you? Well neither did I."

card.name: Flotsam - Riffraff
card.text: EERIE PAIR: Your characters named Jetsam get +3※.

prop.Flavor: "Ursula needs lore to complete her plan. . . ."

card.name: Friar Tuck - Priest of Nottingham
card.text: YOU THIEVING SCOUNDREL: When you play this character, the player or players with the most cards in their hand chooses and discards a card.

prop.Flavor: "Get outta my church! Out! Out! Out!"

card.name: Helga Sinclair - Femme Fatale
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Helga Sinclair.) THIS CHANGES EVERYTHING: Whenever this character quests, you may deal 3 damage to chosen damaged character.

card.name: Helga Sinclair - Vengeful Partner
card.text: NOTHING PERSONAL: When this character is challenged and banished, banish the challenging character.

prop.Flavor: "You said we were in this together!"

card.name: Jetsam - Riffraff
card.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) EERIE PAIR: Your characters named Flotsam gain Ward.

prop.Flavor: "There must be powerful lore here, very powerful."

card.name: Kit Cloudkicker - Tough Guy
card.text: SKYSURFING: When you play this character, you may return chosen opposing character with 2※ or less to their player's hand.

prop.Flavor: "It's been fun, guys, but I got to be going. Yahoooo!"

card.name: Lyle Tiberius Rourke - Cunning Mercenary
card.text: WELL, NOW YOU KNOW: When you play this character, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.) THANKS FOR VOLUNTEERING: Whenever one of your other characters is banished, each opponent loses 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Believe me, studying gibberish really can take you places!"

card.name: Milo Thatch - King of Atlantis
card.text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Milo Thatch.) TAKE THEM BY SURPRISE: When this character is banished, return all opposing characters to their player's hands.

prop.Flavor: "You don't know what you're tampering with."

card.name: Morph - Space Goo
card.text: MIMICRY: You may play any character with Shift on this character as if this character had any name.

prop.Flavor: "You jiggle-headed blob of mischief!" - John Silver

card.name: Peter Pan - Lost Boy Leader
card.text: I CAME TO LISTEN TO THE STORIES: Once per turn, when this character moves to a location, gain lore equal to that location's◆.

prop.Flavor: "The Illumineers needed someone to find a missing spellbook, and Peter was the first to volunteer."

card.name: Prince John - Phony King
card.text: COLLECT TAXES: Whenever this character quests, each opponent with more lore than you loses 2 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Too late to be known as John the First, he's sure to be known as John the Worst!" - Sheriff of Nottingham
"Some days, it's nice to let the river do the running."

card.name: Shenzi - Hyena Pack Leader
card.text: I'LL HANDLE THIS: While this character is at a location, she gets +3※. WHAT'S THE HURRY?: While this character is at a location, whenever she challenges another character, you may draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Why not stick around for dinner?"

card.name: Sir Hiss - Aggravating Asp
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "Prince John isn't the only one collecting "taxes"!"

card.name: Skippy - Energetic Rabbit
card.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

prop.Flavor: "Even the bravest outlaw knows when to lie low."
"Point him in the right direction, and he'll do the rest"

card.name: Stitch - Covert Agent
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) HIDE: While this character is at a location, he gains Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

prop.Flavor: "For such a flashy dresser, he sure is hard to spot."

card.name: Ursula - Deceiver
card.text: YOU'LL NEVER EVEN MISS IT: When you play this character, chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a song card of your choice.

card.name: Ursula - Deceiver of All
card.text: WHAT A DEAL: Whenever this character sings a song, you may play that song again from your discard for free, then put it on the bottom of your deck.

prop.Flavor: "I don't want much - just the most powerful lore!"

card.name: Wildcat - Mechanic
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) DISASSEMBLE: ↷ - Banish chosen item.

prop.Flavor: "I can take anything apart in under 5 minutes!"

card.name: Zazu - Steward of the Pride Lands
card.text: IT'S TIME TO GO!: While this character is at a location, he gets +1◆.

prop.Flavor: "I'd be lyin' if I said I ran the place, but welcome to the Pride Lands all the same!"

card.name: Has Set My Heaaaaaaart . . .
card.text: (A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Banish chosen item.

prop.Flavor: "He's not real smart And yet, he's touched my little cowhide heart"

card.name: I Will Find My Way
card.text: (A character with cost X or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Chosen character of yours gets +2※ this turn. They may move to a location for free.

prop.Flavor: "I would go most anywhere To feel like I belong"

card.name: Strike a Good Match
card.text: (A character with cost X or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Draw 2 cards, then choose and discard a card.

prop.Flavor: "Please bring honor to us Please bring honor to us all"

card.name: Airfoil
card.text: I GOT TO BE GOING: ↷ - If you've played 2 or more actions this turn, draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Discovered in the lost Sea Duck, it looked good as new."

card.name: Robin's Bow
card.text: FOREST'S GIFT: ↷ - Deal 1 damage to chosen damaged character or location. A BIT OF A LARK: Whenever a character of yours named Robin Hood quests, you may ready this item.

prop.Flavor: "The forest always provides just what you need." - Robin Hood

card.name: Starlight Vial
card.text: EFFICIENT ENERGY: ↷ - You pay 2⬡ less for the next action you play this turn. TRAP: 2⬡, Banish this item - Draw 2 cards, then choose and discard a card.

prop.Flavor: "In the wrong hands, this vial of magic could be disastrous."
"They say the ol' place is haunted, or bewitched, or some such fiddle-faddle." - Colonel

card.name: Fang - River City
card.text: SURROUNDED BY WATER: Characters gain Ward and Evasive while here. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge. Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

prop.Flavor: "A nation protected by fierce assassins and their even fiercer cats."

card.name: Kuzco's Palace - Home of the Emperor
card.text: CITY WALLS: Whenever a character is challenged and banished while here, banish the challenging character.

prop.Flavor: "Sure it's a little small, but also it DOESN'T HAVE A POOL!" - Kuzco

card.name: Ariel - Adventurous Collector
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) INSPIRING VOICE: Whenever you play a song, chosen character of yours gains Evasive until the start of your next turn.

prop.Flavor: "Shipwrecks are great places to find lore - and hide from sharks!"

card.name: Billy Bones - Keeper of the Map

prop.Flavor: "He's after me chest, that fiendish cyborg and his band of cutthroats."

card.name: Captain Hook - Master Swordsman
card.text: NEMESIS: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn. MAN-TO-MAN: Characters named Peter Pan lose Evasive and can't gain Evasive.

card.name: Della Duck - Unstoppable Mom
card.text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

prop.Flavor: "I survived the moon. How tough could the flooded Inklands be?"

card.name: HeiHei - Accidental Explorer
card.text: Mindless Wandering - Once per turn, when this character moves to a location, each opponent loses 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Considering the coconut."

card.name: Hydra - Deadly Serpent
card.text: WATCH THE TEETH: Whenever this character is dealt damage, deal that much damage to chosen opposing character.

prop.Flavor: "More heads are better than one."

card.name: Jim Hawkins - Space Traveler
card.text: THIS IS IT!: When you play this character, you may play a location with cost 4 or less for free. TAKE THE HELM: Whenever you play a location, this character may move there for free.

prop.Flavor: "You're gonna rattle the stars, you are." - John Silver
"If you want a bigger reward, you've got to take bigger risks."

card.name: Kakamora - Menacing Sailor
card.text: PLUNDER: When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "There's a bunch more where he came from."

card.name: Madame Medusa - The Boss
card.text: THAT TERRIBLE WOMAN: When you play this character, banish chosen opposing character with 3※ or less.

prop.Flavor: "Finding lore will be as easy as taking candy from children."

card.name: Maui - Soaring Demigod
card.text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.) IN MA BELLY: Whenever a character of yours named HeiHei quests, this character gets +1◆ and loses Reckless this turn.

prop.Flavor: "You got any more of those chickens hanging around?"

card.name: Maui - Whale
card.text: THIS MISSION IS CURSED: This character can't ready at the start of your turn. I GOT YOUR BACK: 2⬡ - Ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of the turn.

prop.Flavor: "Always ready to make a splash."

card.name: Milo Thatch - Spirited Scholar
card.text: I'M YOUR MAN!: While this character is at a location, he gets +2※.

prop.Flavor: "My grandpa never told me about this place!"

card.name: Moana - Born Leader
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Moana.) WELCOME TO MY BOAT: Whenever this character quests while at a location, ready all other characters here, they can't quest for the rest of this turn.

card.name: Moana - Undeterred Voyager
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "No fire or storm will keep her from her goal."
"Nutsy, button your beak." - Trigger

card.name: Peter Pan - Never Land Hero
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) OVER HERE, TINK: While you have a character named Tinker Bell in play, this character gets +2※.

prop.Flavor: "With Peter, plans often meant diving headlong into danger."

card.name: Peter Pan - Pirate's Bane
card.text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Peter Pan.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) YOU'RE NEXT!: Whenever he challenges a Pirate character, this character takes no damage from the challenge.

card.name: Prince Eric - Expert Helmsman
card.text: SURPRISE MANEUVER: When this character is banished, you may banish chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "The storm came out of nowhere, forcing Eric to turn back before he reached the mysterious structure at the edge of Lorcana."

card.name: Scroop - Backstabber
card.text: BRUTE: While this character has damage, he gets +3※.

prop.Flavor: "Always keep him in front of you. And downwind, if possible."
"He'll join the hunt for lore after he's had a quick snack."

card.name: Slightly - Lost Boy
card.text: THE FOX: If you have a character named Peter Pan in play, you pay 1⬡ less to play this character. Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "Pirates sure are easy to trick!"

card.name: Stitch - Little Rocket
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

prop.Flavor: "Who thought giving him power armor was a good idea?!" - Nani

card.name: Trigger - Not-So-Sharp Shooter
card.text: OLD BETSY: Your characters named Nutsy get +1◆.

prop.Flavor: "Criminently, Trigger! Point that peashooter the other way." - Sheriff of Nottingham
"Finding lore is a lot easier when you have a grappling hook!"

card.name: Divebomb
card.text: Banish one of your characters with Reckless to banish chosen character with less ※ than that character.

card.name: I've Got A Dream
card.text: (A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Ready chosen character of yours at a location. They can't quest for the rest of this turn. Gain lore equal to that location's◆.

prop.Flavor: "Tor would like to quit and be a florist Gunther does interior design"

card.name: On Your Feet! Now!
card.text: Ready all your characters and deal 1 damage to each of them. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Catch them! Before they get away!"

card.name: Voyage
card.text: Move up to 2 characters of yours to the same location for free.

prop.Flavor: "We were voyagers! Why'd we stop?" - Moana

card.name: Maui's Fish Hook
card.text: IT'S MAUI TIME! - If you have a character named Maui in play, you may use this item's Shapeshift ability for free. SHAPESHIFT: ↷, 2⬡ - Choose one: - Chosen character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.) - Chosen character gets +3※ this turn.

card.name: Sumerian Talisman
card.text: SOURCE OF MAGIC: During your turn, whenever one of your characters is banished in a challenge, you may draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Summoned spirit from the dark Show thyself before this arc." - Lena Sabrewing
"Welcome to Agrabah, city of mystery, of enchantment, and the finest merchandise this side of the river." - Merchant

card.name: Jolly Roger - Hook's Ship
card.text: LOOK ALIVE, YOU SWABS!: Characters gain Rush while here. (They can challenge the turn they're played.) ALL HANDS ON DECK!: Your Pirate characters may move here for free.

card.name: RLS Legacy - Solar Galleon
card.text: THIS IS OUR SHIP: Characters gain Evasive while here. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.) HEAVE TOGETHER NOW: If you have a character here, you pay 2⬡ less to move a character of yours here.

card.name: Audrey Ramirez - The Engineer
card.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) SPARE PARTS: Whenever this character quests, ready one of your items.

prop.Flavor: "How'd you break this thing, anyway?"

card.name: Captain Amelia - First in Command
card.text: DISCIPLINE: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

prop.Flavor: "I've spotted a strange structure on the horizon. Hard to port, helmsman!"

card.name: Dewey - Showy Nephew
card.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)

prop.Flavor: "I got it! I knew I could do it! Dewey for the win!"

card.name: Flintheart Glomgold - Lone Cheater
card.text: THEY'LL NEVER SEE IT COMING!: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.

prop.Flavor: "Nobody tells Flintheart Glomgold what to do!"
"Ten thousand years will give you such a crick in the neck!"

card.name: Gramma Tala - Keeper of Ancient Stories
card.text: THERE WAS ONLY OCEAN: When you play this character, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. You may put one into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

prop.Flavor: "Listen with your whole heart, and the ancestors will guide you."

card.name: Gramma Tala - Spirit of the Ocean
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Gramma Tala.) DO YOU KNOW WHO YOU ARE?: Whenever a card is put into your inkwell, gain 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "She will always be with you, no matter how far your journey takes you."

card.name: Gyro Gearloose - Gadget Whiz
card.text: NOW TRY TO KEEP UP: ↷ - Put an item card from your discard on the top of your deck.

prop.Flavor: "Maybe the bulb tech will be less evil this time . . ."

card.name: Huey - Savvy Nephew
card.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.) Three Nephews - Whenever this character quests, if you have characters named Dewey and Louie in play, you may draw 3 cards.

prop.Flavor: "This looks like part of a larger crystal!"
"Hold up, cuz. Why not sit back and enjoy some sweet beats?"

card.name: Kit Cloudkicker - Navigator
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Kit Cloudkicker.) Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

card.name: Kit Cloudkicker - Spunky Bear Cub
card.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

prop.Flavor: "Thrilled to have his airfoil back, he launched into the Inklands."

card.name: Louie - Chill Nephew
card.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)

prop.Flavor: "Found the last one!"

card.name: Maid Marian - Delightful Dreamer
card.text: HIGHBORN LADY: When you play this character, chosen character gets -2※ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "She makes every space more beautiful."

card.name: Mama Odie - Mystical Maven
card.text: THIS GOING TO BE GOOD: Whenever you play a song, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

prop.Flavor: "You dig a little deeper, you'll find everything you need."
"Pluto's job was to keep Gustav's attention so Minnie could get to the cave."

card.name: Rufus - Orphanage Cat
card.text: TOO OLD TO BE CHASING MICE: When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

prop.Flavor: "Faith is a bluebird you see from afar."

card.name: Scrooge McDuck - Richest Duck in the World
card.text: I'M GOING HOME!: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.) I DIDN'T GET RICH BY BEING STUPID: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may play an item for free.

prop.Flavor: "He can make money anywhere."

card.name: Scrooge McDuck - Uncle Moneybags
card.text: TREASURE RIGGER: Whenever this character quests, you pay 1⬡ less for the next item you play this turn.

prop.Flavor: A strange new world is the perfect place to make a strange new fortune!

card.name: The Queen - Mirror Seeker
card.text: CALCULATING AND VAIN: Whenever this character quests, you may look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.

prop.Flavor: "She has only one question, and she'd better like the answer."

card.name: Tinker Bell - Very Clever Fairy
card.text: I CAN USE THAT: Whenever one of your items is banished, you may put that card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

prop.Flavor: "She lives in a world of possibilities."

card.name: Wendy Darling - Authority on Peter Pan
card.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)

card.name: Distract
card.text: Chosen character gets -2※ this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Friend Like Me
card.text: (A character with cost 5 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Each player puts the top 3 cards of their deck into their inkwell facedown and exerted.

prop.Flavor: "You got some power in your corner now."

card.name: How Far I'll Go
card.text: (A character with cost 4 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the other into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

card.name: Repair
card.text: Remove up to 3 damage from one of your locations or characters.

prop.Flavor: "I'm thinkin' about opening a shop here. What do you think?"

card.name: Aurelian Gyrosensor
card.text: SEEKING KNOWLEDGE: Whenever one of your characters quests, you may look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

prop.Flavor: "It can point you toward lost lore, but if you're not careful, it'll lead you off a cliff." - Venturo, an Illumineer

card.name: Heart of Te Fiti
card.text: CREATE LIFE: ↷, 2⬡ - Put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

prop.Flavor: "It takes a pure heart to calm the raging storm within."

card.name: Lucky Dime
card.text: NUMBER ONE: ↷, 2⬡ - Choose a character of yours and gain lore equal to their◆.

prop.Flavor: "This one simple coin changed Scrooge's life forever."

card.name: Scrooge's Top Hat
card.text: BUSINESS EXPERTISE: ↷ - You pay 1⬡ less for the next item you play this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Just the thing to top off another brilliant deal."

card.name: Vault Door
card.text: SEALED AWAY: Your locations and characters at locations gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

prop.Flavor: "Only Scrooge knows about this vault. And he's going to keep it that way."

card.name: Belle's House - Maurice's Workshop
card.text: LABORATORY: If you have a character here, you pay 1⬡ less to play items.

prop.Flavor: "Some of the most important tools in Lorcana are crafted here."
"It's only the coolest home in Lorcana!" - Webby Vanderquack

card.name: Motunui - Island Paradise
card.text: REINCARNATION: Whenever a character is banished while here, you may put that card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

prop.Flavor: "Look at out home! There is no better place to be."

card.name: Eeyore - Overstuffed Donkey
card.text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

prop.Flavor: "Not much of a roadblock, but I suppose I'll do."

card.name: Gustav the Giant - Terror of the Kingdom
card.text: ALL TIED UP: This character enters play exerted and can't ready at the start of your turn. BREAK FREE: During your turn, whenever one of your other characters banished another character in a challenge, you may ready this character.

card.name: Hades - Hotheaded Ruler
card.text: CALL THE TITANS: ↷ - Ready your Titan characters.

prop.Flavor: "Brothers! Titans! Look at you in your squalid prison. Who put you down there?"

card.name: Helga Sinclair - Right-Hand Woman
card.text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2※.)

prop.Flavor: "That was an order, not a suggestion. Let's Go!"

card.name: John Silver - Greedy Treasure Seeker
card.text: CHART YOUR OWN COURSE: For each location you have in play, this character gains Resist +1 and gets +1◆. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

prop.Flavor: "I was never much good at games. Always hated to lose."

card.name: Kida - Royal Warrior
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

prop.Flavor: "She's seen strange things before, but nothing like this."

card.name: Little John - Resourceful Outlaw
card.text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Little John.) OKAY, BIG SHOT: While this character is exerted, your characters with Bodyguard gain Resist +1 and get +1◆.

card.name: Little John - Robin's Pal
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) DISGUISED: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

card.name: Lythos - Rock Titan
card.text: Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.) STONE SKIN: ↷ - Chosen character gains Resist +2 this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Crush Zeus!"

card.name: Mickey Mouse - Stalwart Explorer
card.text: LET'S TAKE A LOOK: This character gets +1※ for each location you have in play.

prop.Flavor: "Mickey knew just where to start searching for the Sorcerer's Hat, but he didn't expect it to be guarded."

card.name: Mickey Mouse - Trumpeter
card.text: SOUND THE CALL: ↷, 2⬡ - Play a character for free.

card.name: Minnie Mouse - Funky Spelunker
card.text: JOURNEY: While this character is at a location, she gets +2※.

prop.Flavor: "She'll never cave under pressure."

card.name: Mr. Smee - Bumbling Mate
card.text: OH DEAR, DEAR, DEAR: At the end of your turn, if this character is exerted and you don't have a Captain character in play, deal 1 damage to this character.

prop.Flavor: "Catch those little - OUCH!"

card.name: Mufasa - Champion of the Pride Lands

prop.Flavor: "Even his name makes enemies quiver in fear."
"Pinned ya again."

card.name: Pyros - Lava Titan
card.text: ERUPTION: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may ready chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "Melt Zeus!"

card.name: Razoul - Palace Guard
card.text: LOOKY HERE: While this character has no damage, he gets +2※.

prop.Flavor: "There's no princess here to save you this time, street rat."
"You call this an ambush? Tsk, tsk. It's barely a bushwhack."

card.name: Robin Hood - Champion of Sherwood
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Robin Hood.) SKILLED COMBATANT: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, gain 2 lore. THE GOOD OF OTHERS: When this character is banished in a challenge, you may draw a card.

card.name: Sheriff of Nottingham - Corrupt Official
card.text: TAXES SHOULD HURT: Whenever you discard a card, you may deal 1 damage to chosen opposing character.

prop.Flavor: The thirteenth Rule of Villainy: Take everything you can, but do it with a smile.

card.name: Simba - Fighting Prince
card.text: STEP DOWN OR FIGHT: When you play this character and whenever he banishes another character in a challenge during your turn, you may choose one: - Draw 2 cards, then choose and discard 2 cards. - Deal 2 damage to chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "He's ready to restore the Pride Lands to their former glory."

card.name: Simba - Rightful King
card.text: TRIUMPHANT STANCE: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, chosen opposing character can't challenge during their next turn.

prop.Flavor: "With dangers multiplying all around, the pride needs its guardian."

card.name: Thaddeus E. Klang - Metallic Leader
card.text: MY TEETH ARE SHARPER: Whenever this character quests while at a location, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "Soon the bells will ring in the sound of your doom!"

card.name: And Then Along Came Zeus
card.text: (A character with cost 4 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Deal 5 damage to chosen character or location.

prop.Flavor: "He hurled his thunderbolt - He zapped Locked those suckers in a vault - They're trapped And on his own stopped chaos in its tracks"

card.name: Ba-Boom!
card.text: Deal 2 damage to chosen character or location

prop.Flavor: "Bigger than your average boom!"

card.name: Olympus Would Be That Way
card.text: Your characters get +3※ while challenging a location this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Now that I set you free, what is the first thing you are going to do?" - Hades

card.name: Rise of the Titans
card.text: Banish chosen location or item.

prop.Flavor: "Oh, we're in trouble, big trouble!"

card.name: Captain Hook's Rapier
card.text: GET THOSE SCURVY BRATS!: During your turn, whenever one of your characters banishes another character in a challenge, you may pay 1⬡ to draw a card. LET'S HAVE AT IT!: Your characters named Captain Hook gain Challenger +1. (They get +1※ while challenging.)

card.name: Gizmosuit
card.text: CYBERNETIC ARMOR: Banish this item - Chosen character gains Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

prop.Flavor: "It stands in the Hall of Lorcana, waiting for someone to speak the secret words."

card.name: Map of Treasure Planet
card.text: KEY TO THE PORTAL: ↷ - You pay 1⬡ less for the next location you play this turn. SHOW THE WAY: You pay 1⬡ less to move your characters to a location.

prop.Flavor: "Gentlemen, this must be kept under lock and key." - Captain Amelia

card.name: Maui's Place of Exile - Hidden Island
card.text: ISOLATED: Characters gain Resist +1 while here. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

prop.Flavor: "Nothing but boulders and sand - easy to miss."
Sir Hiss: "I say, sire, your mother's castle will be the perfect place to set up our scheme!" Prince John: "Mommy!"

card.name: The Bayou - Mysterious Swamp
card.text: SHOW ME THE WAY: Whenever a character quests while here, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

prop.Flavor: "A place to find what you need, not just what you want."
"Falling for Julieta was the easiest thing he'd ever done."

card.name: Alma Madrigal - Family Matriarch
card.text: TO THE TABLE: When you play this character, you may search your deck for a Madrigal character card and reveal that card to all players. Shuffle your deck and put that card on top of it.

prop.Flavor: "Let's be clear, Abuela runs this show." - Mirabel

card.name: Ariel - Singing Mermaid
card.text: Singer 7 (This character counts as cost 7 to sing songs.)

prop.Flavor: "Watch and you'll see-some day I'll be part of your world!"

card.name: Cinderella - Melody Weaver
card.text: Singer 9 (This character counts as cost 9 to sing songs.) BEAUTIFUL VOICE: Whenever this character sings a song, your other Princess characters get +1◆ this turn.

card.name: Cogsworth - Majordomo
card.text: AS YOU WERE!: Whenever this character quests, you may give chosen character -2※ until the start of your next turn.

prop.Flavor: "If it's a fight they want, we'll be ready for them."
"Sweet Daisy, the fairest duck I ever met Each flaxen lock a rush of flowing gold Her bill the color of summer sunset Exquisite plumes, a wonder to behold"

card.name: Daisy Duck - Musketeer Spy
card.text: INFILTRATION: When you play this character, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

prop.Flavor: "She has a talent for thwarting hidden schemes."

card.name: Donald Duck - Musketeer Soldier
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) WAIT FOR ME!: When you play this character, chosen character gets +1◆ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Who needs a gift when you're having this much fun?"

card.name: Gaston - Despicable Dealer
card.text: DUBIOUS RECRUITMENT: ↷ - You pay 2⬡ less for the next character you play this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Yes, yes, everything will be ready. Just make sure you do your part."

card.name: Golden Harp - Enchanter of the Land
card.text: STOLEN AWAY: At the end of your turn, if you didn't play a song this turn, banish this character

prop.Flavor: "You'll miss her when she's gone."

card.name: Goofy - Musketeer Swordsman
card.text: EN GAWRSH!: Whenever you play a character with Bodyguard, ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Count me in!"

card.name: Julieta Madrigal - Excellent Cook
card.text: SIGNATURE RECIPE: When you play this character, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character. If you removed damage this way, you may draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Eat this, mi amor."

card.name: Max - Loyal Sheepdog
card.text: HERE BOY: If you have a character named Prince Eric in play, you play 1⬡ less to play this character.

card.name: Mickey Mouse - Leader of the Band
card.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.) STRIKE UP THE MUSIC: When you play this character, chosen character gains Support this turn.

card.name: Mickey Mouse - Musketeer Captain
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.) Bodyguard, Support MUSKETEERS UNITED: When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, you may draw a card for each character with Bodyguard you have in play.

card.name: Minnie Mouse - Musketeer Champion
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) DRAMATIC ENTRANCE: When you play this character, banish chosen opposing character with 5※ or more.

card.name: Mirabel Madrigal - Gift of the Family
card.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.) SAVING THE MIRACLE: Whenever this character quests, your other Madrigal characters ger +1◆ this turn.

card.name: Mirabel Madrigal - Prophecy Finder
card.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)

prop.Flavor: "Why would Bruno break this prophecy? Could it be something dangerous? We have to find out!"

card.name: Pluto - Rescue Dog
card.text: TO THE RESCUE: When you play this character, you may remove up to 3 damage from one of your characters.

prop.Flavor: "When you need help, his is the first face you want to see."

card.name: Prince Eric - Seafaring Prince
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

card.name: Prince Eric - Ursula's Groom
card.text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Prince Eric.) UNDER VANESSA'S SPELL: While you have a character named Ursula in play, this character gains Bodyguard and gets +2⛨. (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

prop.Flavor: "Moving to the music, he begins to understand the true meaning of ohana and how he fits into the family he has found."

card.name: Ursula - Eric's Bride
card.text: Shift: Discard a song card (You may discard a song card to play this on top of one of your characters named Ursula.) VANESSA'S DESIGN: Whenever this character quests, chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a non-character card of your choice.

card.name: Ursula - Vanessa
card.text: Singer 4 (This character counts as cost 4 to sing songs.)

prop.Flavor: "This magic will certainly do the trick."

card.name: Bruno's Return
card.text: Return a character card from your discard to your hand. Then remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "I feel like I missed something important."

card.name: First Aid
card.text: Remove up to 1 damage from each of your characters.

prop.Flavor: "There, now-isn't that better?"

card.name: Look at this Family
card.text: Sing Together 7 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 7 or more may ↷ to sing this song for free.) Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may reveal up to 2 character cards and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Lost in the Woods.
card.text: (A character with cost X or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) All opposing characters get -2※ until the start of your next turn.

prop.Flavor: "I'm left behind, wondering if I should follow."

card.name: Sign the Scroll
card.text: Each opponent may choose and discard a card. For each opponent who doesn't, you gain 2 lore.

card.name: Miracle Candle
card.text: ABUELA'S GIFT: Banish this item - If you have 3 or more characters in play, gain 2 lore and remove up to 2 damage from chosen location.

card.name: Record Player
card.text: LOOK AT THIS!: Whenever you play a song, chosen character gets -2※ until the start of your next turn. HIT PARADE: Your characters named Stitch count as having +1 cost to sing songs.

card.name: Atlantica - Concert Hall
card.text: UNDERWATER ACOUSTICS: Characters count as having +2 cost to sing songs while here.

card.name: The Underworld - River Styx
card.text: SAVE A SOUL: Whenever a character quests while here, you may pay 3⬡ to return a character card from your discard to your hand.

prop.Flavor: "Once upon a time, there was a casita in the mountains with a very special family. . . ."

card.name: Belle - Accomplished Mystic
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Belle.) ENHANCED HEALING: When you play this character, move up to 3 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

prop.Flavor: "The mixed ink had changed more than just the rose."

card.name: Belle - Untrained Mystic
card.text: HERE NOW, DON'T DO THAT: When you play this character, move up to 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

prop.Flavor: "No matter what she tried, Belle couldn't completely heal Beast's wound."

card.name: Bruno Madrigal - Out of the Shadows
card.text: IT WAS YOUR VISION: When you play this character, chosen character gains "When this character is banished in a challenge, you may return this card to your hand" this turn."

card.name: Bruno Madrigal - Undetected Uncle
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) YOU JUST HAVE TO SEE IT: ↷ - Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put that card into your hand and gain 3 lore. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

card.name: Camilo Madrigal - Prankster
card.text: MANY FORMS: At the start of your turn, you may choose one: - This character gets +1◆ this turn. - This character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (While challenging, this character gets +2※.)

card.name: Dolores Madrigal - Easy Listener
card.text: MAGICAL INFORMANT: When you play this character, if an opponent has an exerted character in play, you may draw a card.

card.name: Elsa - Storm Chaser
card.text: TEMPEST: ↷ - Chosen character gains Challenger +2 and Rush this turn. (They get +2※ while challenging. They can challenge the turn they're played.)

prop.Flavor: "After Elsa dispersed Ursula's storm, Anna was nowhere to be found."

card.name: Flotsam - Ursula's "Baby"
card.text: QUICK ESCAPE: When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand. OMINOUS PAIR: Your characters named Jetsam gain "When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand."

prop.Flavor: "Now the crown and the trident are mine!" - Ursula

card.name: Flotsam & Jetsam - Entangling Eels
card.text: Shift: Discard 2 cards (You may discard 2 cards to play this on top of one of your characters named Flotsam or Jetsam.) (This character counts as being named both Flotsam and Jetsam.)

card.name: Isabela Madrigal - Golden Child
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) LADIES FIRST: During your turn, if no other character has quested this turn, this character gets +3◆. LEAVE IT TO ME: Whenever this character quests, your other characters can't quest for the rest of this turn.

card.name: Jetsam - Ursula's "Baby"
card.text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2※.) OMINOUS PAIR: Your characters named Flotsam gain Challenger +2.

prop.Flavor: "He snatched the trident from the betrayed glimmer"

card.name: Luisa Madrigal - Magically Strong One
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

prop.Flavor: "This rock? No problem. Go get that prophecy hermana!"

card.name: Magic Broom - Illuminary Keeper
card.text: NICE AND TIDY: Whenever you play another character, you may banish this character to draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Just a few barnacles away from retirement . . ."
"Clean like no one's watching."
"Have you ever seen anything so beautiful?" She asked, marveling at the Amethyst trees. "No, cherie," Lumiere replied, never taking his eyes off her. "I have not."

card.name: Marshmallow - Terrifying Snowman
card.text: BEHEMOTH: This character gets +1※ for each card in your hand.

prop.Flavor: "You're very strong. Do you work out?" - Olaf

card.name: Mrs. Potts - Enchanted Teapot
card.text: IT'LL TURN OUT ALL RIGHT: When you play this character, if you have a character named Lumiere or Cogsworth in play, you may draw a card.

card.name: Pepa Madrigal - Weather Maker
card.text: IT LOOKS LIKE RAIN: When you play this character, you may exert chosen opposing character. That character can't ready at the start of their next turn unless they're at a location.

card.name: Peter Pan - Shadow Finder
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) FLY, OF COURSE!: You other characters with Evasive gain Rush.

prop.Flavor: "He spotted a mysterious glow in the mountains nearby. Could it be a missing piece of the prophecy?"

card.name: Tick-Tock - Ever-Present Pursuer
