card.name: Juju - Mama Odie’s Companion
card.text: BEES’ KNEES: When you play this character, move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

prop.Flavor: "Juju! You get yourself out of that there magic, you bad boy!" - Mama Odie
"The signs, they never lie. The snake thinks he’s planned for everything. . . Oh, ho, ho! He forgot about the owl. There’s hope yet!"

card.name: Tinker Bell - Fast Flier
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: She zips through the waves without a drop of water touching her.

card.name: The Carpenter - Dinner Companion
card.text: I’LL GET YOU!: When this character is banished, you may exert chosen character.

prop.Flavor: The Carpenter’s stomach growled as he clenched his hammer tight. . .

card.name: Iago - Reappearing Parrot
card.text: GUESS WHO: When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand.

prop.Flavor: "You think you can get rid of me that easy?!"
. . .While the Walrus finished off the lot, down to the final bite.

card.name: Scar - Tempestuous Lion
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they’re played.) Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3※.)

card.name: Tinker Bell - Queen of the Azurite Fairies
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Tinker Bell.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) SHINING EXAMPLE: Whenever this character quests, your other Fairy characters get +1◆ this turn.

card.name: Diablo - Obedient Raven
card.text: FLY MY PET!: When this character is banished, you may draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Go, and do not fail me." - Maleficent

card.name: March Hare - Absurd Host
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they’re played.)

prop.Flavor: "Clear the table? Don’t mind if I do!"
"Carpet’s always come through for us before! He won’t let us down now." - Jasmine

card.name: Rafiki - Ethereal Guide
card.text: Shift 7 (You may pay 7⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Rafiki.) ASTRAL ATTUNEMENT: During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may draw a card.

card.name: Genie - Wish Fulfilled
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) WHAT COMES NEXT?: When you play this character, draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Oh, does that feel good!"

card.name: Sisu - Uniting Dragon
card.text: TRUST BUILDS TRUST: Whenever this character quests, reveal the top card of your deck. If it’s a Dragon character card, put it into your hand and repeat this effect. Otherwise, put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Madam Mim - Truly Marvelous
card.text: OH, BAT GIZZARDS: 2⬡, Choose and discard a card - Gain 1 lore.

card.name: Yzma - Conniving Scientist
card.text: FEEL THE POWER: ↷ - If you have fewer than 3 cards in your hand, draw until you have 3 cards in your hand.

card.name: Mama Odie - Solitary Sage
card.text: I’VE GOT TO DO EVERYTHING AROUND HERE: Whenever you play a song, you may move up to 2 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

card.name: Peter Pan - Shadow Catcher
card.text: GOTCHA!: During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, exert chosen opposing character.

prop.Flavor: "You’re not getting away from me this time!"

card.name: Mad Hatter - Eccentric Host
card.text: WE’LL HAVE TO LOOK INTO THIS: Whenever this character quests, you may look at the top card of the chosen player’s deck. Put it on top of their deck or into their discard.

card.name: A Very Merry Unbirthday
card.text: (A character with cost 1 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Each opponent puts the top 2 cards of their deck into their discard.

prop.Flavor: Now blow the candle out, my dear And make your wish come true

card.name: Genie - Wonderful Trickster
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Genie.) YOUR REWARD AWAITS: Whenever you play a card, draw a card. FORBIDDEN TREASURE: At the end of your turn, put all the cards in your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Making Magic
card.text: Move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character. Draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "That’s got some zang to it!" - Mama Odie

card.name: Lose the Way
card.text: Exert chosen character. Then, you may choose and discard a card. If you do, the exerted character can’t ready at the start of their next turn.

prop.Flavor: "Well, when one’s lost, I suppose it’s good advice to stay where you are until someone finds you." - Alice

card.name: Seeking the Half Crown
card.text: For each Sorcerer character you have in play, you pay 1⬡ less to play this action. Draw 2 cards.

prop.Flavor: "l see the other half, in the Inklands. Quick, my tiny companion! Fetch me that crown!" - Jafar

card.name: Maleficent’s Staff
card.text: BACK, FOOLS!: Whenever one of your opponents’ characters, items, or locations is returned to their hand from play, gain 1 lore.

card.name: Mad Hatter's Teapot
card.text: NO ROOM, NO ROOM: ↷, 1⬡ - Each opponent puts the top card of their deck into their discard.

prop.Flavor: Alice: "My goodness, the tea missed the cup!" Mad Hatter: "No, no, my dear - the cup missed the tea!"

card.name: Pixie Dust
card.text: FAITH AND TRUST: ↷, 2⬡ - Chosen character gains Challenger +2 and Evasive until the start of your next turn. (While challenging, they get +2※. Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

prop.Flavor: Legends say that whenever something goes missing, it’s been taken to build the fairy ships of the Azurite Sea.

card.name: Mystical Tree - Mama Odie’s Home
card.text: NOT BAD: At the start of your turn, you may move 1 damage counter from chosen character here to chosen opposing character. HARD-EARNED WISDOM: At the start of your turn, if you have a character named Mama Odie here, gain 1 lore.

card.name: Jasmine - Royal Seafarer
card.text: BY ORDER OF THE PRINCESS: When you play this character, choose one: • Exert chosen damaged character. • Chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

card.name: Captain Hook - Underhanded
card.text: INSPIRES DREAD: While this character is exerted, opposing Pirate characters can't quest. UPPER HAND: Whenever this character is challenged, draw a card.

card.name: Stitch - Alien Buccaneer
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Stitch.) READY FOR ACTION: When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, you may put an action card from your discard on the top of your deck.

card.name: Go Go Tomago - Darting Dynamo
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) STOP WHINING, WOMAN UP: When you play this character, you may pay 2⬡ to gain lore equal to the damage on chosen opposing character.

card.name: Honey Lemon - Chemical Genius
card.text: HERE'S THE BEST PART: When you play this character, you may pay 2⬡ to have each opponent choose and discard a card.

prop.Flavor: "You're going to love this!"

card.name: Fred - Mascot by Day
card.text: HOW COOL IS THAT: Whenever this character is challenged, gain 2 lore.

prop.Flavor: ". . . but by night . . . I am also a school mascot."
Every Lost Boy has a favorite hiding spot. Tootles has twelve.
"By Jove, he must be around here somewhere. Basil! Basil! Shout if - aaahhh!"

card.name: Heathcliff - Stoic Butler
card.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

prop.Flavor: Loyal butler, training partner, helicopter pilot - completely unstoppable.

card.name: Basil - Hypnotized Mouse
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "Hmm. Footprints from a large. . . owl? With droplets of water? Clearly some avian menace has crossed the Azurite Sea and absconded with the crown!"

card.name: Donald Duck - First Mate
card.text: CAPTAIN ON DECK: While you have a Captain character in play, this character gets +2◆.

prop.Flavor: "A promotion! It's about time someone recognized my natural leadership skills!"

card.name: Daisy Duck - Pirate Captain
card.text: DISTANT SHORES: Whenever one of your Pirate characters quests while at a location, draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "The answers we’re looking for are on the other side of that maze, I just know it!"
"Get out of my way before I run you over."

card.name: Prince Phillip - Royal Explorer
card.text: Ward (Opponents can’t choose this character except to challenge.)

card.name: Jasmine - Royal Commodore
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Jasmine.) RULER OF THE SEAS: When you play this character, if you used Shift to play her, return all other exerted characters to their players’ hands.

card.name: Peter Pan - Never Land Prankster
card.text: LOOK INNOCENT: This character enters play exerted. CAN'T TAKE A JOKE?: While this character is exerted, each opposing player can't gain lore unless one of their characters has challenged this turn.

card.name: Hercules - Baby Demigod
card.text: Ward (Opponents can’t choose this character except to challenge.) STRONG LIKE HIS DAD: 3⬡ - Deal 1 damage to chosen damaged character.

card.name: Alistair Krei - Ambitious Entrepreneur
card.text: AN EYE FOR TECH: When you play this character, if an opponent has an item in play, gain 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Sleek yet strong. . . These inkrunners are an extraordinary feat of engineering."

card.name: Gazelle - Angel with Horns
card.text: YOU CAN REALLY MOVE: When you play this character, chosen character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge that character.)

card.name: Goofy - Expert Shipwright
card.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) CLEVER DESIGN: Whenever this character quests, chosen character gains Ward until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Bellwether - Assistant Mayor
card.text: FEAR ALWAYS WORKS: During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can’t quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

card.name: Basil – Disguised Detective
card.text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Basil.) TWISTS AND TURNS: During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may pay 1⬡ to have chosen opponent choose and discard a card.

prop.Flavor: She had searched high and low in the Illuminary for any hint of Basil. Instead, she found something completely unexpected. . .

card.name: Bend To My Will
card.text: Each opponent discards all cards in their hand.

prop.Flavor: "At last! This is where your luck runs out!"

card.name: Prepare To Board!
card.text: Chosen character gets +2※ this turn. If a Pirate character is chosen, they get +3※ instead.

prop.Flavor: "Bring me the treasure, bring me that ship, and bring me Peter Pan!" - Captain Hook

card.name: Heffalumps and Woozles
card.text: (A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Chosen opposing character can’t quest during their next turn. Draw a card.

prop.Flavor: If honey’s what you covet, you’ll find that they love it

card.name: Mosquito Bite
card.text: Put 1 damage counter on chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "Don’t move. A mosquito has chosen me as her perch. She’s so…beautiful."

card.name: You Came Back
card.text: Ready chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "Nobody gets left behind." - Stitch

card.name: Megabot
card.text: HAPPY FACE: This item enters play exerted. DESTROY!: ↷, Banish this item - Choose one: • Banish chosen item. • Banish chosen damaged character.

card.name: Galactic Communicator
card.text: RESOURCE ALLOCATION: 1⬡, Banish this item - Return chosen character with 2※ or less to their player’s hand.

card.name: Transport Pod
card.text: GIVE ‘EM A SHOW: At the start of your turn, you may move a character of yours to a location for free.

prop.Flavor: "We’ve reinvented the very concept of transportation." - Alistair Krei

card.name: Perilous Maze - Watery Labyrinth
card.text: LOST IN THE WAVES: Whenever a character is challenged while here, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

card.name: Owl Island - Secluded Entrance
card.text: TEAMWORK: For each character you have here, You pay 1⬡ less for the first action you play each turn. A LOT TO LEARN: Whenever you play a second action in a turn, gain 3 Lore.

card.name: Mickey Mouse - Pirate Captain
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.) MARINER’S MIGHT Whenever this character quests, chosen Pirate character gets +2※ and gains “This character takes no damage from challenges” this turn.

card.name: Kakamora - Boarding Party
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

prop.Flavor: Moana: "Do you think they saw us?" Maui: "They saw us:"

card.name: Kakamora - Pirate Pitcher
card.text: DIZZYING SPEED: When you play this character, chosen Pirate character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

card.name: Jasmine - Rebellious Princess
card.text: YOU’LL NEVER MISS IT: Whenever this character quests, each opponent loses 1 lore.

card.name: Raya - Kumandran Rider
card.text: COME ON, LET’S DO THIS: Once during your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may ready another chosen character of yours. They can’t quest for the rest of the turn.

card.name: Wendy Darling - Courageous Captain
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) LOOK LIVELY, CREW!: While you have another Pirate character in play, this character gets +1※ and +1◆.

card.name: John Silver - Ferocious Friend
card.text: CHART YOUR OWN COURSE: Whenever this character quests, you may deal 1 damage to another chosen character of yours. If you do, ready that character. They can’t quest for the rest of this turn.

card.name: Vanellope Von Schweetz - Gutsy Go-Getter
card.text: AS READY AS I’LL EVER BE: At the start of your turn, if this character is at a location, draw a card and gain 1 lore.

card.name: Markowski - Space Trooper
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "Just what we needed - a new place to fight bugs."

card.name: Abu - Bold Henchman
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they’re played.)

prop.Flavor: "Port, Abu! Port! To the left! ABU! The other way!" - Aladdin

card.name: Mickey Mouse - Courageous Sailor
card.text: SOLID GROUND: While this character is at a location, he gets +2※.

prop.Flavor: "Golly, this looked a lot easier from the ship. But I know I can make it - the crew is counting on me!"

card.name: Adorabeezle Winterpop - Ice Rocker Racer
card.text: KEEP DRIVING: While this character has damage, she gets +1◆.

prop.Flavor: "It'll take more than that to knock me out of the race!"

card.name: Moana - Self-Taught Sailor
card.text: LEARNING THE ROPES: This character can’t challenge unless you have a Captain character in play.

prop.Flavor: "You wanna tell me I don’t know what I’m doing? I know I don’t!"

card.name: Aladdin - Intrepid Commander
card.text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Aladdin.) REMEMBER YOUR TRAINING: When you play this character, your characters get +2※ this turn.

card.name: Minnie Mouse - Pirate Lookout
card.text: LAND, HO!: Once during your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may return a location card from your discard to your hand.

prop.Flavor: Minnie leaned forward. Could it be true? Was this the island at last?

card.name: Moana - Kakamora Leader
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Moana.) GATHERING FORCES: When you play this character, you may move any number of your characters to the same location for free. Gain 1 lore for each character you moved.

card.name: Goofy - Flying Goof
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they’re played.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "Hold on to yer hat!"

card.name: Maui - Half-Shark
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) CHEEEEHOOOO!: Whenever this character challenges another character, you may return an action card from your discard to your hand. WAYFINDING: Whenever you play an action, gain 1 lore.

card.name: Hades - Strong Arm
card.text: WHAT ARE YOU GONNA DO?: ↷, 3⬡, Banish one of your characters - Banish chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "Panic, use your head for once!"

card.name: Tigger - In the Crow's Nest
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) SWASH YOUR BUCKLES: Whenever you play an action, this character gets +1※ and +1◆ this turn.

card.name: Scar - Heartless Hunter
card.text: TEETH AND AMBITIONS: When you play this character, deal 2 damage to chosen character of yours to deal 2 damage to another chosen character.

prop.Flavour: "It’s for the greater good. I’m sure you understand." - Scar

card.name: Thievery
card.text: Chosen opponent loses 1 lore. Gain 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: Apples, gems, magic lamp . . .Abu’s not picky as long as there’s something worth stealing.

card.name: Lead the Way
card.text: Your characters get +2※ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "We have what it takes to find our way through this maze, together! Hold on - we’re going in!"

card.name: The Islands I Pulled From The Sea
card.text: (A character with cost 3 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Search your deck for a location card, reveal that card to all players, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

prop.Flavor: So what can I say except. . . you’re welcome

card.name: Energy Blast
card.text: Banish chosen character. Draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Did you really think I would fight fair?"

card.name: Longboat
card.text: TAKE IT FOR A SPIN: 2⬡ - Chosen character of yours gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

card.name: Gold Coin
card.text: SPARKLY ACCESS: ↷, 1⬡, Banish this item - Ready chosen character of yours. They can’t quest for the rest of this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Sweet mother of monkey milk! A gold coin!" - Vanellope von Schweetz

card.name: Card Soldier’s Spear
card.text: A SUITABLE WEAPON: Your damaged characters get +1※.

card.name: Flotilla - Coconut Armada
card.text: TINY THIEVES: At the start of your turn, if you have a character here, all opponents lose 1 lore and you gain lore equal to the lore lost this way.

card.name: Skull Rock - Isolated Fortress
card.text: FAMILIAR GROUND: Characters get +1※ while here. SAFE HAVEN: At the start of your turn, if you have a Pirate character here, gain 1 lore.

card.name: Aunt Cass - Biggest Fan
card.text: HAPPY TO HELP: Whenever this character quests, chosen Inventor character gets +1◆ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "All right, geniuses, let’s feed those hungry brains."

card.name: Gadget Hackwrench - Creative Thinker
card.text: BRAINSTORM: Whenever you play an item, this character gets +1◆ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Golly, a perfect wingnut! There’s about a million uses for that!"

card.name: Gadget Hackwrench - Brilliant Bosun
card.text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Gadget.) MECHANICALLY SAVVY: While you have 3 or more items in play, you pay 1⬡ less to play Inventor characters.

card.name: Zipper - Astute Decoy
card.text: Ward (Opponents can’t choose this character except to challenge.) RUN INTERFERENCE: During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, another chosen character gains Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

card.name: Oswald - The Lucky Rabbit
card.text: FAVORABLE CHANCE: During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an item card, you may play that item for free and it enters play exerted. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Yokai - Enigmatic Inventor
card.text: TIME TO UPGRADE: Whenever this character quests, you may return one of your items to your hand to pay 2⬡ less for the next item you play this turn.

card.name: Pleakley - Scientific Expert
card.text: REPORTING FOR DUTY: When you play this character, put chosen character of yours into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

prop.Flavor: "As the duly appointed representative for the Galactic Council, I volunteer for this assignment!"

card.name: Hiro Hamada - Robotics Prodigy
card.text: SWEET TECH: ↷ , 2⬡ - Search your deck for an item card or a Robot character card and reveal it to all players. Shuffle your deck and put that card on top of it.

prop.Flavor: "A couple more tweaks and I've just about. . . got it!"

card.name: HeiHei - Not-So-Tricky Chicken
card.text: EAT ANYTHING: When you play this character, exert chosen opposing item. It can’t ready at the start of its next turn. OUT TO LUNCH: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

card.name: Sour Bill - Surly Henchman
card.text: UNPALATABLE: When you play this character, chosen opposing characters gets -2※ this turn.

card.name: Nick Wilde - Soggy Fox
card.text: NICE TO HAVE A PARTNER: While you have another character with Support in play, this character gets +2※.

prop.Flavor: "Glad you could make it."

card.name: Wasabi - Methodical Engineer
card.text: BLADES OF FURY: When you play this character, you may banish chosen item. Its player gains 1 lore. QUICK REFLEXES: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

card.name: Nick Wilde - Sly Fox
card.text: Shift 1 (You may pay 1⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Nick Wilde.) YOU CAN’T TOUCH ME: While you have an item in play, this character can’t be challenged.

prop.Flavor: "All the clues pointed to an island, but I never thought I’d see it on a map. Golly, this is incredible! I mean, the island actually exists, so it’s technically credible - but still! This is amazing!"
"Of course! It all makes sense. That’s why my old star charts are useless. Every star in the sky here is different!"

card.name: Tadashi Hamada - Baymax Inventor
card.text: LET’S GET BACK TO WORK: This character gets +1※ and +1⛨ for each item you have in play.

prop.Flavor: "I’m not giving up on you. You don’t understand this yet, but people need you."

card.name: Hiro Hamada - Team Leader
card.text: I NEED TO UPGRADE ALL OF YOU: Your other Inventor characters gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.) SHAPE THE FUTURE: 2⬡ - Look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Tadashi Hamada - Gifted Roboticist
card.text: SOMEONE HAS TO HELP: During an opponent’s turn, when this character is banished, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown. Then, put this card into your inkwell facedown.

card.name: Baymax - Personal Healthcare Companion
card.text: FULLY CHARGED: If you have an Inventor character in play, you pay 1⬡ less to play this character. YOU SAID 'OW': 2⬡ - Remove up to 1 damage from another chosen character.

card.name: Baymax - Armored Companion
card.text: THE TREATMENT IS WORKING: When you play this character and whenever he quests, you may remove up to 2 damage from another chosen character of yours. Gain 1 lore for each 1 damage removed this way.

card.name: Yokai - Scientific Supervillain
card.text: Shift 6 (You may pay 6⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Yokai.) NEUROTRANSMITTER: You may play items named Microbots for free. TECHNICAL GAIN: Whenever this character quests, draw a card for each opposing character with 0※.

card.name: Alice - Savvy Sailor
card.text: Ward (Opponents can’t choose this character except to challenge.) AHOY!: Whenever this character quests, another chosen character of yours get +1◆ and gains Ward until the start of your next turn.

card.name: We Could Be Immortals
card.text: (A character with cost 4 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Your Inventor characters gain Resist +6 this turn. Then, put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 6.)

card.name: Sail The Azurite Sea
card.text: This turn, you may put an additional card from your hand into your inkwell facedown. Draw a card.

prop.Flavor: You need a good plan and even better luck to make it across these treacherous waters.

card.name: Helping Hand.
card.text: Chosen character gains Support this turn. Draw a card. (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character’s ※ this turn.)

prop.Flavor: "When you’re making the world a better place, every little thing helps." - Judy Hopps

card.name: Prepare Your Bot
card.text: Choose one: • Ready chosen item. • Ready chosen Robot character. They can’t quest for the rest of this turn.

card.name: Baymax’s Healthcare Chip
card.text: 10,000 MEDICAL PROCEDURES: ↷ - Choose one: • Remove up to 1 damage from chosen character. • If you have a Robot character in play, remove up to 3 damage from chosen character.

card.name: Microbots
card.text: LIMITLESS APPLICATIONS: You may have any number of cards named Microbots in your deck. INSPIRED TECH: When you play this item, chosen character gets -1※ this turn for each item named Microbots you have in play.

card.name: Jumbo Pop
card.text: HERE YOU GO: Banish this item - Remove up to 2 damage from each of your characters. Draw a card.

card.name: Rescue Rangers Submarine - Mobile Headquarters
card.text: PLANNING SESSION: At the start of your turn, if you have a character here, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

card.name: Institute of Technology - Prestigious University
card.text: WELCOME TO THE LAB: Inventor characters get +1⛨ while here. PUSH THE BOUNDARIES: At the start of your turn, if you have a character here, gain 1 lore.

card.name: Kakamora - Long-Range Specialist
card.text: A LITTLE HELP: When you play this character, if you have another Pirate character in play, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character or location.

prop.Flavor: "They’re very good at making trouble." - Maui

card.name: Kakamora - Pirate Chief
card.text: HEAD COCONUT: Whenever this character quests, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card to deal 1 damage to chosen character or location. If you discarded a Pirate, deal 3 damage to chosen character or location instead.

card.name: Jim Hawkins - Stubborn Cabin Boy
card.text: COME ON, COME ON, COME ON!: During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, this character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2※ while challenging.)

card.name: Mr. Big - Shrewd Tycoon
card.text: REPUTATION: This character can’t be challenged by characters with 2※ or greater.

prop.Flavor: "You’ve done me a great service."

card.name: Mr. Smee - Steadfast Mate
card.text: GOOD CATCH: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

card.name: Mr. Smee - Captain of the Jolly Roger
card.text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Mr. Smee.) RAISE THE COLORS: When you play this character, you may deal damage to chosen character equal to the number of your other Pirate characters in play.

card.name: Mullins - Seasoned Shipmate
card.text: FALL IN LINE: While you have a character named Mr. Smee in play, this character gains Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

prop.Flavor: "l told you we’d find an island eventually! Excellent navigating. Yes, yes, I’m quite proud. Now, a toast to our success!"

card.name: Hercules - Unwavering Demigod
card.text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2※.)

prop.Flavor: "That maze wasn’t so bad! let’s see what this island has in store for us."

card.name: John Silver - Ship’s Cook
card.text: HUNK OF HARDWARE: When you play this character, chosen character can’t challenge during their next turn.

prop.Flavor: "At the end of the day, it’s the simplest tools that come through for you in a pinch."

card.name: Mr. Arrow - Legacy’s First Mate
card.text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

prop.Flavor: "We’re holding steady, Captain. Despite this wind. And these waves."

card.name: Jim Hawkins - Rigging Specialist
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Jim Hawkins.) BATTLE STATION: When you play this character, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character or location.

prop.Flavor: "Raya: "Nothing gets past Tuk Tuk. Nothing." Sisu: "Except butterflies! Oh, and birds!" Raya: "Fine. Most things don’t get past Tuk Tuk."

card.name: Billy Bones - Space Sailor
card.text: KEEP IT HIDDEN: When this character is banished, you may banish chosen item or location.

prop.Flavor: "He’ll be comin’ soon. Can’t let them find this."

card.name: Pluto - Guard Dog
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) GOOD BOY: While this character has no damage, he gets +4※.

card.name: Mickey Mouse - Nightwatchman
card.text: BACKUP: Your characters named Pluto gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

prop.Flavor: "Gee, Donald was right - it’s spooky out here in the dark!"

card.name: Cobra Bubbles - Former CIA
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.) THINK ABOUT WHAT’S BEST: 2⬡ - Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

card.name: Wreck-It Ralph - Ham Hands
card.text: I WRECK THINGS: Whenever this character quests, you may banish chosen item or location to gain 2 lore.

card.name: Calhoun - Marine Sergeant
card.text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.) LEVEL UP: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, gain 2 lore.

card.name: Captain Amelia - Commander of the Legacy
card.text: DRIVELING GALOOTS: This character can’t be challenged by Pirate characters. EVERYTHING SHIPSHAPE: While being challenged, your other characters gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

card.name: Jafar - Power-Hungry Vizier
card.text: YOU’LL GET WHAT’S COMING TO YOU: During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, deal 1 damage to chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "The broken crown’s power is formidable, but not enough. With both halves of the Hexwell Crown, I could rule all of Lorcana!"

card.name: John Silver - Stern Captain
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named John Silver.) Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.) DON’T JUST SIT THERE!: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to each opposing ready character.

card.name: Hot Potato
card.text: Choose one: • Deal 2 damage to chosen character. • Banish chosen item.

prop.Flavor: "This is not going to end well." - Pleakley

card.name: I’m Still Here
card.text: (A character with cost 3 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Chosen character gains Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. Draw a card. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

card.name: Twin Fire
card.text: Deal 2 damage to chosen character. Then, you may choose and discard a card to deal 2 damage to another chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "I got ’em!" "No, I got ’em!"

card.name: Ambush!
card.text: ↷ one of your characters to deal damage equal to their ※ to chosen character.

prop.Flavor: Pirates will use any advantage they can get.

card.name: Unfortunate Situation
card.text: Each opponent chooses one of their characters and deals 4 damage to them.

card.name: King’s Sensor Core
card.text: SYMBOL OF ROYALTY: Your Prince and King characters gain Resist +1 (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.) ROYAL SEARCH: ↷, 2⬡ - Reveal the top card of your deck. If it’s a Prince or King character, you may put that card into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

card.name: Training Dummy
card.text: HANDLE WITH CARE: ↷, 2⬡ - Chosen character gains Bodyguard until the start of your next turn. (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

card.name: Sunglasses
card.text: SPYCRAFT: ↷ - Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

prop.Flavor: The coolest accessory for top agents.

card.name: Treasure Mountain - Azurite Sea Island
card.text: SECRET WEAPON: At the start of your turn, deal damage to chosen character or location equal to the number of characters here.

card.name: Galactic Council Chamber - Courtroom
card.text: FEDERATION DECREE: While you have an Alien or Robot character here, this location can't be challenged.
